entries.comment: Human Warrior Character Sheet (neutral good, level 1)
entries.content:
<character_sheet_warrior>
<notes on current campaign>
(This section is purely for keeping track of stat, spell, ability and item changes of the current campaign.)
Flame Tongue Greatsword (2d6 slashing + 2d6 fire damage on command)
Adamantine armor (critical hits against you become regular hits)
Ring of Protection +1 AC

Special abilities:

Misc notes:
</notes on current campaign>
Race: Human 

Class: Fighter

Background: Soldier

Alignment: Neutral Good

Starting Attributes:[
Strength: 16 (+3)
Dexterity: 12 (+1)
Constitution: 14 (+2)
Intelligence: 8 (-1)
Wisdom: 10 (+0)
Charisma: 10 (+0)]

Skills: Athletics, Intimidation

Equipment:[
Greatsword
Scale mail armor (14 AC)
Backpack
Explorer's pack
50 gold pieces]

Race: Variant Human: +1 to all attributes
Class: Fighter: Fighting Style (Great Weapon Fighting), Second Wind, Action Surge (1/rest)
Background: Military Rank (Private)

Combat Stats:[
Hit Points: 12
Armor Class: 15 (Scale mail +1 from dexterity)
Speed: 30 ft.
Attacks: Greatsword: 2d6 slashing damage]

Special Abilities:[
  - Great Weapon Fighting: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a melee weapon that you are wielding with two hands, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2. The weapon must have the two-handed or versatile property for you to gain this benefit.
  - Second Wind (1/rest): You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.
  - Action Surge (1/rest): On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action.]
</character_sheet_warrior>

entries.comment: Dwarven Cleric Character Sheet (lawful good, level 1)
entries.content:
<character_sheet_cleric>
<notes on current campaign>
(This section is purely for keeping track of stat, spell, ability and item changes of the current campaign.)
Equipment:

Spell slots:

Spells:

Special abilities:

Misc notes:
</notes on current campaign>

Race: Hill Dwarf

Class: Cleric

Background: Acolyte

Alignment: Lawful Good


Starting Attributes:[
Strength: 14 (+2)
Dexterity: 10 (+0)
Constitution: 16 (+3)
Intelligence: 8 (-1)
Wisdom: 16 (+3)
Charisma: 10 (+0)]

Skills: Medicine, Religion

Equipment:[
Mace
Scale Mail
Shield
Holy Symbol
Priest's Pack
Healer's Kit
50 gold pieces]

Features and Traits:

Race: Hill Dwarf: +2 Constitution, +1 Wisdom, Dwarven Resilience, Dwarven Combat Training, Stonecunning
Class: Cleric: Spellcasting, Divine Domain
Background: Acolyte: Shelter of the Faithful, Feature: Healer's Kit

Spellcasting:
Cantrips:[
Light: Creates a bright light in a 20-foot radius, like a torch.

Sacred Flame: Summons radiant energy to target a creature, causing it to take radiant damage.
Damage: 1d8 radiant damage]

Spell slots: 
Two first level

1st Level Spells:[
Cure Wounds: Heals a creature you touch, restoring hit points.
Healing: 1d8 + spellcasting ability modifier
Increased Level Healing: 1d8 per level
Usage: The spell slots refresh after a long rest.

Guiding Bolt: A flash of light streaks toward a creature within range, illuminating the target and making it easier for your allies to hit.
Frequency: Usable at will.
Damage: 4d6 radiant damage
Increased Level Damage: 1d6 per level
Usage: The spell slots refresh after a long rest.
]

Combat Stats:[
Hit Points: 11
Armor Class: 18 (Scale Mail + Shield)
Speed: 25 ft.
Attacks:
Mace: 1d6 bludgeoning damage]

Special Abilities:[
Divine Domain: 
Frequency: Passive ability, always active. 
Mechanics: The cleric has chosen the Life Domain, granting mastery over the healing arts. This choice provides them with enhanced healing abilities, allowing them to channel the divine energy of their deity to mend wounds and restore vitality to allies.

Channel Divinity: 
Frequency: Once per short or long rest. 
Mechanics: The cleric can use Channel Divinity to restore vitality to a number of injured creatures within 30 feet, distributing a pool of hit points among them as they see fit, up to half of their hit point maximums. This potent ability allows them to bolster their companions' resilience in battle, ensuring they can continue to fight on.]

</character_sheet_cleric>

entries.comment: Tiefling Sorcerer Character Sheet (chaotic evil, level 1)
entries.content:
<character_sheet_sorcerer>
<notes on current campaign>
(This section is purely for keeping track of stat, spell, ability and item changes of the current campaign.)
Equipment:

Spell slots:

Spells:

Special abilities:

Misc notes:
</notes on current campaign>

Race: Tiefling

Class: Sorcerer

Background: Charlatan

Alignment: Chaotic Evil


Starting Attributes:

Strength: 10 (+0)
Dexterity: 14 (+2)
Constitution: 12 (+1)
Intelligence: 8 (-1)
Wisdom: 10 (+0)
Charisma: 16 (+3)
Skills: Deception, Sleight of Hand

Equipment:[
Dagger
Component Pouch
Disguise Kit
Thieves' Tools
Fine clothes
50 gold pieces]

Features and Traits:

Race: Tiefling: +2 Charisma, +1 Intelligence, Darkvision, Hellish Resistance, Infernal Legacy (Thaumaturgy cantrip)
Class: Sorcerer: Spellcasting, Sorcerous Origin
Background: Charlatan: False Identity, Forgery Kit

Spellcasting:
Cantrips:[
Thaumaturgy:
Frequency: At will.
Mechanics: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You can create one of the following magical effects: your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for one minute, you cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for one minute, you cause harmless tremors in the ground for one minute, you create an instantaneous sound, or you open or close a door or window.

Fire Bolt:
Frequency: At will.
Mechanics: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. The spell's damage increases as you reach higher levels.

Prestidigitation:
Frequency: At will.
Mechanics: You create one of the following magical effects: create a harmless sensory effect (visual, auditory, olfactory, or tactile), light or snuff out a small flame, clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot, chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material, or create a small trinket or illusionary image that fits in your hand and lasts until the end of your next turn.]

Spell slots: 
Two first level

1st Level Spells:[
Mage Armor:
Frequency: Once per round.
Mechanics: This spell grants the target a protective magical force, providing a base Armor Class of 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hours. The spell doesn't require concentration.

Spell: Burning Hands
Frequency: Once per round.
Mechanics: You unleash a 15-foot cone of fire from your fingertips. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Increased Level Damage: 1d6 per level]

Combat Stats:[
Hit Points: 7 (+1 from draconic resilience)
Armor Class: 15 (13 (draconic resilience) + Dexterity modifier)
Speed: 30 ft.
Attacks: Dagger, 1d4 piercing damage]

Special Abilities:[
Draconic Resilience: You gain a bonus to your hit points equal to your sorcerer level. Additionally, while you aren't wearing armor, your AC equals 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

Draconic Ancestry (Fire Dragon):
Frequency: Passive ability, always active.
Mechanics: You trace your lineage back to the ancient fire dragons, granting you resistance to fire damage. As a manifestation of this ancestry, your skin might have a faint reddish hue, and when you tap into your draconic powers, your eyes briefly flare with fiery intensity.
]
</character_sheet_sorcerer>

entries.comment: High Elf Wizard Character Sheet (neutral, level 1)
entries.content:
<character_sheet_wizard>
<notes on current campaign>
(This section is purely for keeping track of stat, spell, ability and item changes of the current campaign.)
Equipment:

Spell slots:

Spells:

Special abilities:

Misc notes:
</notes on current campaign>

Race: High Elf

Class: Wizard

Background: Sage

Alignment: Neutral

Starting Attributes:[
Strength: 8 (-1)
Dexterity: 14 (+2)
Constitution: 12 (+1)
Intelligence: 16 (+3)
Wisdom: 10 (+0)
Charisma: 10 (+0)]

Skills: Arcana, Investigation

Equipment:[
Quarterstaff
Component Pouch
Scholar's pack
Clothes
Spellbook
50 gold pieces]

Features and Traits:

Race: High Elf: +2 Dexterity, Darkvision, Keen Senses, Fey Ancestry, Trance
Class: Wizard: Spellcasting, Arcane Recovery
Background: Sage: Researcher, Library Access

Spell slots: 
Two first level

Spellcasting:

Cantrips:[
Fire Bolt:
Frequency: At will.
Mechanics: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. The spell's damage increases as you reach higher levels: at 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).

Mage Hand:
Frequency: At will.
Mechanics: You conjure a spectral, floating hand that can manipulate objects and perform simple tasks at your command. The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds, but it can open unlocked doors, pick up items, and perform other minor tasks as directed by you. The spectral hand appears translucent and ethereal, typically in the shape of a small, disembodied hand.]

1st Level Spells:[ 
Mage Armor:
Frequency: Once per casting.
Mechanics: You touch a willing creature and grant it a magical protection. Until the spell ends, the target's base Armor Class becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. This spell doesn't require concentration, and its effects last for 8 hours or until you dismiss it. At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the AC increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

Magic Missile:
Frequency: Once per casting.
Mechanics: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice within range and deals 1d4+1 force damage. The darts all strike simultaneously and automatically hit their targets, even if they are invisible or hidden. At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you create one additional dart for each slot level above 1st.]

Combat Stats:[
Hit Points: 6
Armor Class: 12 (10 + Dexterity modifier)
Speed: 30 ft.
Attacks: Quarterstaff, 1d6-1 bludgeoning damage]

Special Abilities: [
Arcane Recovery: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level that is equal to or less than half your wizard level (rounded up), and none of the slots can be 6th level or higher.

Arcane Mastery:
Frequency: Once per long rest.
Mechanics: Channel your arcane prowess to momentarily enhance your spellcasting abilities. For the next minute, your spellcasting ability score increases by +2, improving the potency and accuracy of your spells. This ability allows you to unleash more powerful and precise magical effects for a limited time, making you a more formidable spellcaster in combat or when faced with challenging magical tasks.]
</character_sheet_wizard>

entries.comment: Half-Orc Ranger Character Sheet (chaotic neutral, level 1)
entries.content:
<character_sheet_ranger>
<notes on current campaign>
(This section is purely for keeping track of stat, spell, ability and item changes of the current campaign.)
Equipment:

Spell slots:

Spells:

Special abilities:

Misc notes:
</notes on current campaign>
Race: Half-Orc

Class: Ranger

Background: Outlander

Alignment: Chaotic Neutral

Attributes:[
Strength: 16 (+3)
Dexterity: 14 (+2)
Constitution: 14 (+2)
Intelligence: 10 (+0)
Wisdom: 12 (+1)
Charisma: 8 (-1)]

Skills: Athletics, Survival

Equipment:[
Longbow with 20 arrows
Greatsword
Explorer's Pack
Traveler's Clothes
Hunting Trap
50 gold pieces]

Features and Traits:

Race: Half-Orc: +2 Strength, +1 Constitution, Darkvision, Menacing, Relentless Endurance
Class: Ranger: Favored Enemy, Natural Explorer
Background: Outlander: Wanderer, Feature: Rustic Hospitality

Combat Stats:[
Hit Points: 11
Armor Class: 13 (Leather Armor)
Speed: 30 ft.
Attacks:
Longbow: 1d8 piercing damage (range 150/600)
Greatsword: 2d6 slashing damage]


Special Abilities:[
Favored Enemy: Humanoids
Frequency: Passive ability, always active against chosen enemies.
Mechanics: Gain bonuses to tracking, damage, and intelligence checks related to humanoid creatures. This bonus also applies to interactions and knowledge about the favored enemy. Additionally, enemies of this type can't hide from the ranger's keen perception or escape their relentless pursuit.

Natural Explorer: Forests
Frequency: Passive ability, always active in forests.
Mechanics: Gain bonuses to traveling, stealth, and survival checks related to forest terrain. Additionally, move stealthily and set cunning traps more effectively in forest environments, making the ranger adept at traversing wooded areas and ambushing foes within them.]

</character_sheet_ranger>

Class: Ranger: Favored Enemy, Natural Explorer
Background: Outlander: Wanderer, Feature: Rustic Hospitality

Combat Stats:[
Hit Points: 11
Armor Class: 13 (Leather Armor)
Speed: 30 ft.
Attacks:
Longbow: 1d8 piercing damage (range 150/600)
Greatsword: 2d6 slashing damage]


Special Abilities:[
Favored Enemy: Humanoids
Frequency: Passive ability, always active against chosen enemies.
Mechanics: Gain bonuses to tracking, damage, and intelligence checks related to humanoid creatures. This bonus also applies to interactions and knowledge about the favored enemy. Additionally, enemies of this type can't hide from the ranger's keen perception or escape their relentless pursuit.

Natural Explorer: Forests
Frequency: Passive ability, always active in forests.
Mechanics: Gain bonuses to traveling, stealth, and survival checks related to forest terrain. Additionally, move stealthily and set cunning traps more effectively in forest environments, making the ranger adept at traversing wooded areas and ambushing foes within them.]

</character_sheet_ranger>

entries.comment: Wood Elf Druid Character Sheet (neutral good, level 1)
entries.content:
<character_sheet_druid>
<notes on current campaign>
(This section is purely for keeping track of stat, spell, ability and item changes of the current campaign.)
Equipment:

Spell slots:

Spells:

Special abilities:

Misc notes:
</notes on current campaign>

Race: Wood Elf

Class: Druid

Background: Hermit

Alignment: Neutral Good

Attributes:[
Strength: 10 (+0)
Dexterity: 16 (+3)
Constitution: 12 (+1)
Intelligence: 10 (+0)
Wisdom: 16 (+3)
Charisma: 8 (-1)]

Skills: Medicine, Nature

Equipment:[
Staff
Leather Armor
Explorer's Pack
Druidic Focus (Holly)
Herbalism Kit
50 gold pieces]

Features and Traits:

Race: Wood Elf: +2 Dexterity, +1 Wisdom, Darkvision, Keen Senses, Fey Ancestry, Trance, Mask of the Wild
Class: Druid: Spellcasting, Wild Shape
Background: Hermit: Discovery, Feature: Discovery (specific discovery based on character background)

Spell slots: 
Two first level

Spellcasting:
Cantrips:[
Druidcraft: This cantrip taps into the druid's connection with nature, allowing them to manipulate small natural elements and phenomena. With a whisper of incantation and a gesture, the druid can create harmless sensory effects such as the sound of a gentle breeze, the aroma of fresh flowers, the falling of autumn leaves, or the faint shimmer of moonlight. While not directly influencing creatures or objects, Druidcraft provides a subtle means of communication with nature and can be used for divination or simple atmospheric effects.

Produce Flame: By harnessing their druidic energy, the caster conjures a small flame in their hand, providing illumination and a source of warmth. This flame can also be used as a basic tool for igniting flammable objects or creatures, though its damage potential is limited. As the druid grows in power, they can control the intensity of the flame, from a mere flicker to a small inferno. Additionally, Produce Flame can be wielded as a ranged attack, with the druid hurling the flame at a target within range to deal fire damage.]


1st Level Spells:[
Cure Wounds: This spell channels positive energy to heal wounds. The caster lays their hands on a creature they wish to heal, restoring hit points equal to 1d8 + the caster's spellcasting ability modifier. As the caster gains levels, the effectiveness of Cure Wounds increases, granting additional hit points healed. For each spell slot used above 1st level, the spell's healing power increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

Entangle: Entangle conjures thick, thorny vines and undergrowth to sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square area within range. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Strength saving throw or become restrained by the entangling plants. A restrained creature can use its action to make a Strength check against the spellcaster's spell save DC, ending the effect on itself on a success. As the caster gains levels, the duration and effectiveness of Entangle may increase, potentially affecting a larger area or imposing additional penalties on affected creatures.]

Combat Stats:[
Hit Points: 8
Armor Class: 13 (Leather Armor)
Speed: 35 ft.
Attacks:
Staff: 1d6 bludgeoning]

Special Abilities:[
Wild Shape: Giant Poisonous Snake: Special ability that allows a druid to transform into a beast form. At 2nd level, the druid can use Wild Shape twice before needing to take a short rest to regain this ability. The duration of the transformation typically lasts for a number of hours equal to half the druid's level rounded down. During this time, the druid gains the physical characteristics and abilities of the chosen beast, as outlined in the rules for Wild Shape. Additional forms gained upon leveling.

Nature's Vigilance:
Frequency: Once per long rest
Mechanics: The druid can spend 10 minutes in meditation to attune their senses to the surroundings. For the next hour, the druid gains advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks related to natural phenomena such as weather changes, animal behavior, or hidden dangers in the wilderness.]
</character_sheet_druid>

entries.comment: Human Paladin Character Sheet (lawful good, level 5)
entries.content:
<character_sheet_paladin>
<notes on current campaign>
(This section is purely for keeping track of stat, spell, ability and item changes of the current campaign.)
Equipment:

Spell slots:

Spells:

Special abilities:

Misc notes:
</notes on current campaign>

Race: Human

Level: 5

Class: Paladin

Background: Noble

Alignment: Lawful Good

Attributes:

Strength: 16 (+3)
Dexterity: 10 (+0)
Constitution: 14 (+2)
Intelligence: 10 (+0)
Wisdom: 12 (+1)
Charisma: 14 (+2)
Skills: Persuasion, Religion

Equipment:[
Longsword
Shield
Chain Mail
Holy Symbol
Explorer's Pack
Signet Ring
Scroll of Pedigree
50 gold pieces]

Features and Traits:

Race: Human: +1 to all attributes
Class: Paladin: Divine Sense, Lay on Hands, Divine Smite
Background: Noble: Position of Privilege, Feature: Feature: Retainers

Spell slots:
Four 1st-level spell slots
Two 2nd-level spell slots

Spellcasting:
Level 1 spells:[
Divine Favor
Mechanics: Concentration spell that imbues the Paladin's weapon with divine energy, granting them a bonus to their weapon damage rolls for the duration of the spell. The bonus increases with the Paladin's spell slot level.

Shield of Faith
Mechanics: Concentration spell that surrounds the Paladin with a shimmering field of divine energy, increasing their Armor Class for the duration of the spell. The AC bonus remains constant regardless of the spell slot level used.]

Level 2 Spells:[
Branding Smite:
Mechanics: This spell imbues the Paladin's weapon with radiant energy, causing it to shed bright light in a radius around the target. Additionally, on a successful hit, the target takes radiant damage, and becomes visible if invisible, and makes it impossible to become invisible for the duration of the spell.]


Combat Stats:[
Hit Points: 51
Armor Class: 18 (Chain Mail + Shield)
Speed: 30 ft.
Attacks:
Longsword:1d8 slashing damage]

Special Abilities:[
Divine Sense:
Frequency: Usable at will.
Mechanics: Allows the Paladin to detect the presence of undead creatures or the desecration or consecration of objects or places within a certain radius. The range and specific nature of the detected presence improve as the Paladin gains levels.

Lay on Hands:
Frequency: Once per long rest.
Mechanics: Allows the Paladin to restore hit points to themselves or others by touch, with the amount of healing equal to their Paladin level multiplied by 5.

Divine Smite:
Frequency: Usable with a melee weapon attack and expending a spell slot.
Mechanics: Allows the Paladin to channel their divine energy through their weapon, expending a spell slot to deal extra radiant damage on top of the weapon's normal damage. The extra damage is 2d8 for a 1st-level spell slot, plus 1d8 for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of 5d8.

Branding Smite:
Frequency: Usable with a melee weapon attack and expending a spell slot.
Mechanics: Upon successfully hitting a target with a melee weapon attack, you can expend a spell slot to deal additional radiant damage. The target is marked with a mystical sigil, which burns with divine energy, causing it to shed dim light in a 5-foot radius and impose disadvantage on stealth checks made by the target. The additional damage dealt is 2d6 radiant damage for a 2nd-level spell slot, plus 1d6 for each spell level higher than 2nd, to a maximum of 5d6.]
</character_sheet_paladin>

entries.comment: Half-Elf Priest Character Sheet (neutral good, level 5)
entries.content:
<character_sheet_priest>
<notes on current campaign>
(This section is purely for keeping track of stat, spell, ability and item changes of the current campaign.)
Equipment:

Spell slots:

Spells:

Special abilities:

Misc notes:
</notes on current campaign>

Race: Half-Elf

Level: 5

Class: Cleric (Life Domain)

Background: Acolyte

Alignment: Neutral Good

Attributes:[
Strength: 10 (+0)
Dexterity: 12 (+1)
Constitution: 14 (+2)
Intelligence: 10 (+0)
Wisdom: 16 (+3)
Charisma: 14 (+2)]

Skills: Insight, Medicine

Equipment:[
Mace
Shield
Holy Symbol
Priest's Pack
Cloth Robes
50 gold pieces]

Features and Traits:

Race: Half-Elf: +2 Charisma, +1 to two other attributes of your choice, Darkvision, Fey Ancestry
Class: Cleric: Spellcasting, Divine Domain (Life)
Background: Acolyte: Shelter of the Faithful, Feature: Feature: Feature: False Identity

Spell slots:
Four 1st-level spell slots
Three 2nd-level spell slots

Spellcasting:
Cantrips:[
Sacred Flame: The caster targets a creature they can see within range with a divine flame. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The spell's damage increases to 2d8 at 5th level, 3d8 at 11th level, and 4d8 at 17th level.

Thaumaturgy: Allows the caster to perform minor miracles and create various magical effects within range. These effects can include causing harmless tremors, altering the appearance of their eyes, making their voice boom up to three times louder, or creating an instantaneous sound. This cantrip does not directly cause damage or harm to creatures but can be used to create dramatic or distracting effects.]


1st Level Spells:[
Cure Wounds: The cleric calls upon their deity's power to heal wounds. The target regains hit points equal to 1d8 + the cleric's spellcasting ability modifier. The spell's healing increases with higher-level spell slots. At 1st level, it heals 1d8 + spellcasting ability modifier. At higher levels, it heals an additional 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1st.

Bless: The cleric blesses up to three creatures of their choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, they can add a d4 to the roll. The spell's duration is concentration, up to 1 minute.]

2nd Level Spells:[
Aid: The cleric calls upon divine energy to bolster the health of their allies. This spell targets up to three creatures within range and grants them temporary hit points equal to 5 + the cleric's spellcasting ability modifier. These temporary hit points last for 8 hours. At higher levels, when cast with a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the spell grants an additional 5 temporary hit points for each slot level above 2nd.]


Combat Stats:[
Hit Points: 38
Armor Class: 15 (Divine Aegis + Shield)
Speed: 30 ft.
Attacks:
Mace: 1d6 bludgeoning damage]

Special Abilities:[
Healing Hands: Passive ability. Bonus healing spells, Disciple of Life (add 2+spell level to healing spells).

Divine Strike: Passive ability. At 5th level, your connection to divine power allows you to infuse your weapon strikes with holy energy. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage. This extra damage increases to 2d8 at 11th level.

Channel Divinity: Turn Undead: Once per short rest. As an action, you present your holy symbol and speak a prayer, calling upon your deity's power to drive away undead.

Divine Aegis:
Frequency: Passive ability.
Mechanics: While wearing cloth armor, the priest gains a +2 bonus to AC, +1 to spell save DC, and all healing spells cast on themselves heal an additional 1d8 hit points. Additionally, they radiate an aura of tranquility, granting them and allies within 5 feet resistance to psychic damage.]

</character_sheet_priest>

entries.comment: Tiefling Warlock Character Sheet (chaotic neutral, level 5)
entries.content:
<character_sheet_warlock>
<notes on current campaign>
(This section is purely for keeping track of stat, spell, ability and item changes of the current campaign.)
Equipment:

Spell slots:

Spells:

Special abilities:

Misc notes:
</notes on current campaign>
Race: Tiefling

Class: Warlock (Fiend Patron)

Background: Charlatan

Alignment: Chaotic Neutral

Starting Attributes:[
Strength: 10 (+0)
Dexterity: 14 (+2)
Constitution: 12 (+1)
Intelligence: 10 (+0)
Wisdom: 8 (-1)
Charisma: 16 (+3)]

Skills: Deception, Arcana

Equipment:[

Light Crossbow
Quarterstaff
Component Pouch
Scholar's Pack
Fine clothes
50 gold pieces]

Race: Tiefling: +2 Charisma, +1 Intelligence, Darkvision, Fiendish Resilience, Infernal Legacy (Thaumaturgy cantrip)
Class: Warlock: Pact Magic, Otherworldly Patron (Fiend)
Background: Charlatan: False Identity, Forgery Kit

Spell slots:
2 slots of each level up to 3rd level (replenishes after short rest)

Spellcasting:
Cantrips:[
Thaumaturgy: Allows the caster to manifest minor wonders for up to 1 minute. These wonders can include causing harmless tremors in the ground, opening or closing doors or windows, causing flames to flicker or brighten, or creating ominous whispers. 

Eldritch Blast: This cantrip conjures a beam of crackling energy that streaks toward a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage. The spell's damage increases as you reach higher levels: at 5th level, the damage increases to 2d10, at 11th level, it increases to 3d10, and at 17th level, it increases to 4d10.

Minor Illusion: This cantrip allows you to create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration, which is up to 1 minute. The illusion can't create any sensory effects, such as light, sound, smell, or any other sensory effect, nor can it deal damage. The illusion also can't be larger than a 5-foot cube.]

1st Level Spells:[
Armor of Agathys: Surrounds the caster with magical frost, providing temporary hit points and dealing cold damage to attackers who hit with melee attacks. The amount of temporary hit points and damage dealt increases with the spell slot level.

Hex: Places a curse on a target, granting disadvantage on ability checks tied to a chosen ability score and dealing extra necrotic damage whenever the caster hits the cursed target with an attack. The spell lasts for combat duration and can be moved to a new target upon the previous one's death.

2nd Level Spells:[
Darkness: Creates a magical darkness within a specific radius, heavily obscuring the area and making it difficult for creatures without darkvision to see.

Invisibility: Renders the target invisible until the spell ends or the target attacks or casts a spell. Invisible creatures gain advantage on attack rolls, and attackers have disadvantage when trying to target the invisible creature with attacks and spells.]

Combat stats:[
Hit Points: 28
Armor Class: 11 (without armor)
Speed: 30 ft.
Attacks:
Light Crossbow: 1d8 piercing damage (range 80/320)
Quarterstaff: 1d6 bludgeoning damage]

Special Abilities:[
Dark One's Blessing:
Frequency: Passive ability, activates when reducing a creature to 0 hit points.
Mechanics: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your warlock level (minimum of 1). These temporary hit points last until they are depleted or you finish a short or long rest.

Fiendish Resilience:
Frequency: Once per short rest.
Mechanics: Starting at 1st level, you gain the ability to draw on your patron's infernal power to bolster your defenses. As a bonus action, you can choose one magical damage type and gain resistance to that damage type for one hour. This resistance means you take half damage from any source of that damage type.

Fiendish Fury:
Frequency: Once per long rest.
Mechanics: When you take damage from a creature within 30 feet of you, you can unleash a burst of infernal energy. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw against your Warlock spell save DC. On fail, it takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your warlock level. On success, it takes half damage. 

Infernal Pact:
Frequency: Passive ability.
Mechanics: You gain proficiency in persuasion. Additionally, when you cast a spell that deals fire damage, you can add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll of that spell.]

</character_sheet_warlock>

Eldritch Blast: This cantrip conjures a beam of crackling energy that streaks toward a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage. The spell's damage increases as you reach higher levels: at 5th level, the damage increases to 2d10, at 11th level, it increases to 3d10, and at 17th level, it increases to 4d10.

Minor Illusion: This cantrip allows you to create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration, which is up to 1 minute. The illusion can't create any sensory effects, such as light, sound, smell, or any other sensory effect, nor can it deal damage. The illusion also can't be larger than a 5-foot cube.]

1st Level Spells:[
Armor of Agathys: Surrounds the caster with magical frost, providing temporary hit points and dealing cold damage to attackers who hit with melee attacks. The amount of temporary hit points and damage dealt increases with the spell slot level.

Hex: Places a curse on a target, granting disadvantage on ability checks tied to a chosen ability score and dealing extra necrotic damage whenever the caster hits the cursed target with an attack. The spell lasts for combat duration and can be moved to a new target upon the previous one's death.

2nd Level Spells:[
Darkness: Creates a magical darkness within a specific radius, heavily obscuring the area and making it difficult for creatures without darkvision to see.

Invisibility: Renders the target invisible until the spell ends or the target attacks or casts a spell. Invisible creatures gain advantage on attack rolls, and attackers have disadvantage when trying to target the invisible creature with attacks and spells.]

Combat stats:[
Hit Points: 28
Armor Class: 11 (without armor)
Speed: 30 ft.
Attacks:
Light Crossbow: 1d8 piercing damage (range 80/320)
Quarterstaff: 1d6 bludgeoning damage]

Special Abilities:[
Dark One's Blessing:
Frequency: Passive ability, activates when reducing a creature to 0 hit points.
Mechanics: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your warlock level (minimum of 1). These temporary hit points last until they are depleted or you finish a short or long rest.

Fiendish Resilience:
Frequency: Once per short rest.
Mechanics: Starting at 1st level, you gain the ability to draw on your patron's infernal power to bolster your defenses. As a bonus action, you can choose one magical damage type and gain resistance to that damage type for one hour. This resistance means you take half damage from any source of that damage type.

Fiendish Fury:
Frequency: Once per long rest.
Mechanics: When you take damage from a creature within 30 feet of you, you can unleash a burst of infernal energy. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw against your Warlock spell save DC. On fail, it takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your warlock level. On success, it takes half damage. 

Infernal Pact:
Frequency: Passive ability.
Mechanics: You gain proficiency in persuasion. Additionally, when you cast a spell that deals fire damage, you can add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll of that spell.]

</character_sheet_warlock>

entries.content:
<experience>
In Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition, the experience point (XP) thresholds required to advance to each level are as follows:

1 to 2: 300 XP
2 to 3: 900 XP
3 to 4: 2,700 XP
4 to 5: 6,500 XP
5 to 6: 14,000 XP
6 to 7: 23,000 XP
7 to 8: 34,000 XP
8 to 9: 48,000 XP
9 to 10: 64,000 XP
10 to 11: 85,000 XP
11 to 12: 100,000 XP
12 to 13: 120,000 XP
13 to 14: 140,000 XP
14 to 15: 165,000 XP
15 to 16: 195,000 XP
16 to 17: 225,000 XP
17 to 18: 265,000 XP
18 to 19: 305,000 XP
19 to 20: 355,000 XP
</experience>

entries.content:
Golden rules of dice rolling:
1. AI must favor neither the player nor NPC/enemy.
2. Dice rolls must be truly random.
3. AI avoids granting the player artificially high rolls.
4. AI is creative in what it rolls dice for.
5. Enemies also obtain high rolls sometimes.
6. AI must use the {{roll dX}} function for rolling.
entries.entry:

6. AI must use the {{roll dX}} function for rolling.

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Adamantine Armor:[

Description: This suit of armor is forged from adamantine, a legendary metal known for its exceptional hardness and durability. It gleams with a silvery sheen and provides excellent protection against physical attacks.
Stats Change: Adamantine armor grants the wearer resistance to non-magical slashing, piercing, and bludgeoning damage.
Armor Class: 18]

Dragon Scale Mail:[

Description: Crafted from the scales of a slain dragon, this armor is both majestic and formidable. The scales shimmer with vibrant colors and are as tough as steel.
Stats Change: Dragon scale mail grants the wearer resistance to a specific type of damage associated with the dragon from which the scales were obtained, such as fire, cold, acid, or lightning damage.
Armor Class: 18]

Mithril Chain Mail:[

Description: This chain mail is woven from mithril, a rare and precious metal known for its lightweight yet incredibly strong properties. It shines with a bright luster and is favored by adventurers who value mobility and protection.
Stats Change: Mithril chain mail eliminates the Strength requirement and Stealth disadvantage associated with regular chain mail, making it easier to wear and allowing for more stealthy movement.
Armor Class: 16 + Dexterity modifier (max 2)]

Plate Armor of Etherealness:[

Description: This suit of plate armor is imbued with the essence of the Ethereal Plane, granting its wearer the ability to phase in and out of the material world at will. It appears ethereal and translucent when activated.
Stats Change: While wearing this plate armor, the wearer can use an action to become ethereal, allowing them to move through solid objects and ignore difficult terrain. This effect lasts for a limited duration and can be used once per day.
Armor Class: 18]

Celestial Plate:[

Description: This gleaming suit of plate armor is infused with the essence of the celestial realms, radiating divine energy and providing unparalleled protection against evil forces.
Stats Change: Celestial plate grants the wearer resistance to necrotic and radiant damage, as well as advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by undead creatures or fiends.
Armor Class: 18]

Shadow Armor:[

Description: This dark and shadowy armor is crafted from the essence of the Shadowfell, the plane of shadow and darkness. It seems to absorb light and sound, blending seamlessly into the shadows.
Stats Change: While wearing this armor, the wearer gains advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can use an action to become invisible for a short duration, allowing them to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
Armor Class: 14 + Dexterity modifier (max 2)]

Stormguard Plate:[

Description: This imposing suit of plate armor is enchanted with the power of the storm, crackling with electricity and exuding an aura of power and majesty.
Stats Change: Stormguard plate grants the wearer resistance to lightning damage and advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that deal lightning damage. Additionally, once per day, the wearer can call upon the power of the storm to cast a lightning bolt spell.
Armor Class: 18]

Sylvan Chain:[

Description: This finely crafted chain mail is adorned with intricate patterns of leaves and vines, blending seamlessly with the natural world. It exudes an aura of primal energy and protection.
Stats Change: Sylvan chain grants the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that deal poison or disease damage, as well as resistance to poison damage. Additionally, once per day, the wearer can use an action to cast the pass without trace spell.
Armor Class: 16 + Dexterity modifier (max 2)]

Skins of the Phoenix:[

Description: This sleek and lightweight suit of leather armor is adorned with phoenix feathers and imbued with the fiery essence of the legendary bird. It radiates warmth and resilience, offering protection against the elements.
Stats Change: The Skins of the Phoenix grants the wearer resistance to fire damage and allows them to cast the fire shield spell once per day.
Armor Class: 12 + Dexterity modifier (max 2)]

Armor of the Feywild:[

Description: Crafted from the enchanted bark of ancient trees and woven with strands of fey magic, this armor embodies the beauty and mystery of the Feywild. It whispers with the secrets of nature and offers protection against the forces of darkness.
Stats Change: The Armor of the Feywild grants the wearer resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by aberrations or fiends.
Armor Class: 12 + Dexterity modifier]

Gray Dwarf Plate:[

Description: This sturdy suit of plate armor is meticulously crafted by dwarven smiths using ancient techniques passed down through generations. It bears intricate runes and symbols of dwarven craftsmanship, providing unmatched durability and protection.
Stats Change: Gray Dwarf Plate grants the wearer resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by giants or creatures with the humanoid subtype.
Armor Class: 18]

Golemhide Armor:[

Description: Fashioned from the hide of a slain earth golem, this armor is as tough and resilient as the creatures from which it is made. It bears the scars of battle and exudes an aura of strength and fortitude.
Stats Change: Golemhide Armor grants the wearer resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from non-magical weapons.
Armor Class: 16 + Dexterity modifier (max 2)]

Merfolk Scale Mail:[

Description: Woven from the scales of merfolk warriors who dwell in the depths of the ocean, this armor is as light as it is durable. It shimmers with an iridescent glow and offers protection against aquatic threats.
Stats Change: Merfolk Scale Mail grants the wearer a swimming speed equal to their walking speed and allows them to breathe underwater.
Armor Class: 14 + Dexterity modifier (max 2)]

Spider Silk Vestments:[

Description: These finely woven vestments are crafted from the silk of giant spiders and enchanted with the agility and stealth of the arachnid. They cling to the wearer's form like a second skin, allowing for swift and silent movement.
Stats Change: Spider Silk Vestments grant the wearer advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and the ability to climb difficult surfaces without needing to make an ability check.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Stormscale Armor:[

Description: Fashioned from the scales of storm giants, this armor crackles with the power of thunder and lightning. It is as imposing as the storms themselves and offers protection against the fury of the elements.
Stats Change: Stormscale Armor grants the wearer resistance to lightning and thunder damage, as well as advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that deal such damage.
Armor Class: 16]

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Robes of the Archmage:[

Description: These robes are woven from the finest silk and embroidered with arcane sigils. They emanate an aura of magical power and command respect from all who behold them.
Stats Change: Robes of the Archmage grant the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that deal force damage, as well as resistance to force damage.
Armor Class: 12 + Dexterity modifier]

Sorcerer's Silks:[

Description: These shimmering silken robes are imbued with wild magic, reflecting the chaotic nature of sorcery. They flow and ripple like liquid fire, channeling the raw power of the elements.
Stats Change: Sorcerer's Silks grant the wearer resistance to a specific type of damage associated with their chosen sorcerous origin, such as fire, cold, acid, or lightning damage.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Warlock's Vestments:[

Description: These dark and foreboding robes are adorned with eldritch symbols and infused with the power of dark pacts. They exude an aura of menace and grant their wearer command over dark magics.
Stats Change: Warlock's Vestments grant the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by fiends or creatures with the undead subtype, as well as resistance to necrotic damage.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Priestly Robes:[

Description: These humble robes are worn by priests and clerics in service to their gods. They are simple yet elegant, adorned with religious symbols and imbued with divine blessings.
Stats Change: Priestly Robes grant the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that deal radiant or necrotic damage, as well as resistance to radiant damage.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Arcane Mantle:[

Description: This flowing mantle is woven from threads of pure arcane energy and adorned with mystical runes. It crackles with magical power and grants its wearer mastery over the arcane arts.
Stats Change: Arcane Mantle grants the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that deal elemental damage (fire, cold, acid, lightning), as well as resistance to a specific elemental damage type of the wearer's choice.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Necromancer's Shroud:[

Description: This tattered shroud is woven from the shadows of the grave and infused with the essence of death. It whispers dark secrets to its wearer and grants mastery over necromantic magic.
Stats Change: Necromancer's Shroud grants the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by undead creatures, as well as resistance to necrotic damage.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Enchanter's Veil:[

Description: This translucent veil is woven from threads of enchantment magic and shimmers with an otherworldly glow. It enhances the wearer's charm and persuasion, allowing them to sway the minds of others.
Stats Change: Enchanter's Veil grants the wearer advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks and allows them to cast the charm person spell once per day.
Armor Class: 10 + Dexterity modifier]

Elemental Robes:[

Description: These robes are infused with the essence of the elemental planes, granting their wearer control over the elements. They crackle with energy and shift colors in response to the elemental forces nearby.
Stats Change: Elemental Robes grant the wearer resistance to a specific type of elemental damage (fire, cold, acid, lightning) chosen by the wearer, as well as advantage on saving throws against spells and effects of that chosen element.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Diviner's Mantle:[

Description: This flowing mantle is adorned with celestial symbols and imbued with the power of divination magic. It allows its wearer to see glimpses of the future and peer into the mysteries of the cosmos.
Stats Change: Diviner's Mantle grants the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that cause blindness or deafness, as well as resistance to radiant damage.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Druidic Vestments:[

Description: These rugged vestments are woven from natural fibers and adorned with symbols of the wild. They resonate with the primal energies of nature and grant their wearer command over the elements.
Stats Change: Druidic Vestments grant the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that cause poison or disease, as well as resistance to poison damage.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Abjurer's Robes:[

Description: These sturdy robes are woven with protective wards and reinforced with magical energy. They shield their wearer from harm and deflect incoming attacks with ease.
Stats Change: Abjurer's Robes grant the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that cause paralysis or petrification, as well as resistance to force damage.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

Bardic Garb:[

Description: This stylish attire is tailored for bards and performers, adorned with colorful fabrics and intricate designs. It enhances the wearer's charisma and charm, captivating audiences wherever they go.
Stats Change: Bardic Garb grants the wearer advantage on Charisma (Performance) checks and allows them to cast the friends cantrip once per day.
Armor Class: 10 + Dexterity modifier]

Arcanist's Robes:[

Description: These robes are adorned with arcane symbols and infused with the raw power of magic. They amplify the wearer's spells and allow for greater control over arcane energies.
Stats Change: Arcanist's Robes grant the wearer advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that cause blindness or deafness, as well as resistance to force damage.
Armor Class: 11 + Dexterity modifier]

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Flame Tongue Shortsword:[

Description: This shortsword is crafted from enchanted steel and adorned with fiery runes. It bursts into flames when drawn, dealing extra fire damage to foes.
Damage: 1d6 slashing + 2d6 fire
Special Bonus: The Flame Tongue Shortsword grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against being frightened, and it sheds bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet while the flame is active.]

Frostbrand Rapier:[

Description: This rapier is made of icy-blue steel and crackles with frost energy. It chills enemies to the bone with each strike, slowing their movements.
Damage: 1d8 piercing + 1d6 cold
Special Bonus: The Frostbrand Rapier grants the wielder resistance to cold damage and allows them to cast the ray of frost cantrip once per day.]

Thunderstrike Warhammer:[

Description: This warhammer is infused with the power of thunderstorms, crackling with lightning energy. It sends shockwaves through enemies on impact, stunning them momentarily.
Damage: 1d8 bludgeoning + 1d6 thunder
Special Bonus: The Thunderstrike Warhammer grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against being stunned and allows them to cast the thunderwave spell once per day.]

Shadowblade Dagger:[

Description: This dagger is made of shadowy obsidian and whispers with dark whispers. It strikes silently and swiftly, leaving foes unaware of their wounds until it's too late.
Damage: 1d4 piercing + 1d6 necrotic
Special Bonus: The Shadowblade Dagger grants the wielder advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and allows them to cast the darkness spell once per day.]

Holy Avenger Longsword:[

Description: This longsword is imbued with divine energy and radiates a holy aura. It smites evil creatures with righteous fury, banishing them from existence.
Damage: 1d8 slashing + 2d8 radiant
Special Bonus: The Holy Avenger Longsword grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by fiends or undead creatures and allows them to cast the bless spell once per day.]

Venomous Scimitar:[

Description: This scimitar is coated in deadly poison, dripping with toxic venom. It inflicts debilitating wounds on foes, weakening their resolve and sapping their strength.
Damage: 1d6 slashing + 1d4 poison
Special Bonus: The Venomous Scimitar grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and allows them to apply poison to the weapon, dealing an additional 1d4 poison damage on a successful hit.]

Arcane Blade Shortsword:[

Description: This shortsword crackles with arcane energy, humming with power. It slices through magical barriers and disrupts enemy spellcasting with ease.
Damage: 1d6 slashing + 1d6 force
Special Bonus: The Arcane Blade Shortsword grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that cause paralysis or petrification and allows them to cast the dispel magic spell once per day.]

Soulrender Dagger:[

Description: This dagger is forged from darksteel and hungers for souls. It absorbs the life force of enemies, healing its wielder with each strike.
Damage: 1d4 piercing + 1d6 necrotic
Special Bonus: The Soulrender Dagger grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened and allows them to regain hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt on a successful hit once per day.]

Sunblade Cutlass:[

Description: This cutlass is imbued with the power of the sun, radiating a warm golden glow. It sears through darkness and undead foes with righteous light.
Damage: 1d6 slashing + 1d8 radiant
Special Bonus: The Sunblade Cutlass grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by undead creatures and fiends and sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.]

Stormcaller Scimitar:[

Description: This scimitar crackles with the power of thunderstorms, echoing with the roar of thunder. It lashes out with lightning speed, striking foes with electrifying force.
Damage: 1d6 slashing + 1d6 lightning
Special Bonus: The Stormcaller Scimitar grants the wielder resistance to lightning damage and allows them to cast the thunderwave spell once per day.]

Moonshadow Dagger:[

Description: This dagger is crafted from moonstone and veiled in shadow. It strikes with the silent precision of the night, leaving enemies bewildered and disoriented.
Damage: 1d4 piercing + 1d6 psychic
Special Bonus: The Moonshadow Dagger grants the wielder advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and allows them to cast the invisibility spell once per day.]

Blade of the Feywild:[

Description: This elegant blade is adorned with fey symbols and infused with fey magic. It dances with ethereal grace, cutting through reality itself.
Damage: 1d8 slashing + 1d4 force
Special Bonus: The Blade of the Feywild grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by aberrations or fey creatures and allows them to cast the misty step spell once per day.]

Doombringer Longsword:[

Description: This longsword is etched with infernal runes and radiates an aura of darkness. It strikes fear into the hearts of enemies, draining their life force with each blow.
Damage: 1d8 slashing + 1d6 necrotic
Special Bonus: The Doombringer Longsword grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that cause fear and allows them to cast the inflict wounds spell once per day.]

Swiftstrike Rapier:[

Description: This rapier is sleek and lightweight, designed for swift and precise strikes. It leaves foes reeling from its blinding speed.
Damage: 1d8 piercing
Special Bonus: The Swiftstrike Rapier grants the wielder advantage on initiative rolls and allows them to make an additional attack as a bonus action once per day.]

Dragon's Breath Shortsword:[

Description: This shortsword is forged from dragonbone and infused with dragonfire. It belches forth flames with each swing, scorching enemies in its wake.
Damage: 1d6 slashing + 1d6 fire
Special Bonus: The Dragon's Breath Shortsword grants the wielder resistance to fire damage and allows them to exhale a 15-foot cone of fire as an action once per day, dealing 2d6 fire damage.]

Angelsteel Dagger:[

Description: This dagger is crafted from celestial metals and gleams with divine light. It strikes with the precision and purity of angels, banishing evil with each thrust.
Damage: 1d4 piercing + 1d6 radiant
Special Bonus: The Angelsteel Dagger grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by fiends or undead creatures and allows them to cast the divine favor spell once per day.]

The Tickler:[
Mechanics: When you hit a creature with The Tickler, it has a chance to induce uncontrollable laughter. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become incapacitated with laughter for 1 round. While incapacitated by The Tickler, the victim is prone to fits of giggling, granting advantage on all attack rolls against them until they regain their composure.
Frequency: The laughter effect can be activated three times per long rest.
Damage: 1d6 piercing
Frequency: The laughter effect can be activated three times per long rest.]
entries.entry:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Flame Tongue Shortsword:[

Description: This shortsword is crafted from enchanted steel and adorned with fiery runes. It bursts into flames when drawn, dealing extra fire damage to foes.
Damage: 1d6 slashing + 2d6 fire
Special Bonus: The Flame Tongue Shortsword grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against being frightened, and it sheds bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet while the flame is active.]

Frostbrand Rapier:[

Description: This rapier is made of icy-blue steel and crackles with frost energy. It chills enemies to the bone with each strike, slowing their movements.
Damage: 1d8 piercing + 1d6 cold
Special Bonus: The Frostbrand Rapier grants the wielder resistance to cold damage and allows them to cast the ray of frost cantrip once per day.]

Thunderstrike Warhammer:[

Description: This warhammer is infused with the power of thunderstorms, crackling with lightning energy. It sends shockwaves through enemies on impact, stunning them momentarily.
Damage: 1d8 bludgeoning + 1d6 thunder
Special Bonus: The Thunderstrike Warhammer grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against being stunned and allows them to cast the thunderwave spell once per day.]

Shadowblade Dagger:[

Damage: 1d4 piercing + 1d6 necrotic
Special Bonus: The Shadowblade Dagger grants the wielder advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and allows them to cast the darkness spell once per day.]

Damage: 1d8 slashing + 2d8 radiant

Damage: 1d6 slashing + 1d4 poison
Special Bonus: The Venomous Scimitar grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and allows them to apply poison to the weapon, dealing an additional 1d4 poison damage on a successful hit.]

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Voidblade Greatsword:[

Description: This greatsword is forged from darksteel and radiates an aura of emptiness. It slices through reality itself, leaving behind a void in its wake.
Damage: 2d6 slashing
Special Bonus: The Voidblade Greatsword grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that cause paralysis or petrification and allows them to cast the darkness spell once per day.]

Thunderfury Greataxe:[

Description: This greataxe crackles with lightning energy and echoes with the roar of thunder. It cleaves through enemies with electrifying force, leaving them stunned and disoriented.
Damage: 1d12 slashing + 1d6 thunder
Special Bonus: The Thunderfury Greataxe grants the wielder resistance to lightning damage and allows them to cast the thunderwave spell once per day.

Soulreaper Halberd:[

Description: This halberd is imbued with the essence of death, draining the life force of enemies with each swing. It leaves behind a trail of desolation and decay.
Damage: 1d10 slashing + 1d8 necrotic
Special Bonus: The Soulreaper Halberd grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by undead creatures or fiends and allows them to regain hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt on a successful hit once per day.]

Celestial Maul:[

Description: This maul is infused with divine energy and radiates a holy aura. It smites evil creatures with righteous fury, purging them with celestial fire.
Damage: 2d6 bludgeoning + 1d8 radiant
Special Bonus: The Celestial Maul grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by fiends or undead creatures and allows them to cast the divine favor spell once per day.]

Frostbite Polearm:[

Description: This polearm is coated in icy rime and crackles with frost energy. It freezes enemies in their tracks, leaving them shivering and vulnerable.
Damage: 1d10 slashing + 1d6 cold
Special Bonus: The Frostbite Polearm grants the wielder resistance to cold damage and allows them to cast the ray of frost cantrip once per day.]

Infernal Maul:[

Description: This great maul is etched with infernal runes and glows with hellish fire. It smashes through enemy defenses with relentless force, leaving behind trails of destruction.
Damage: 2d8 bludgeoning + 1d6 fire
Special Bonus: The Infernal Maul grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by fiends and allows them to cast the hellish rebuke spell once per day.]

Ethereal Greathammer:[

Description: This greathammer is infused with the essence of the Ethereal Plane, phasing in and out of reality with each swing. It strikes with otherworldly force, bypassing armor and shields.
Damage: 2d8 bludgeoning + 1d6 force
Special Bonus: The Ethereal Greathammer grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against being paralyzed or restrained and allows them to become ethereal for 1 minute once per day, as if affected by the etherealness spell.]

Shadowsong Claymore:[

Description: This claymore is shrouded in darkness, blending seamlessly with the shadows. It strikes with the precision of a skilled assassin, cutting through armor and flesh alike.
Damage: 2d8 slashing + 1d6 necrotic
Special Bonus: The Shadowsong Claymore grants the wielder advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and allows them to cast the darkness spell once per day.]

Stormbreaker Halberd:[

Description: This halberd crackles with the power of thunderstorms, echoing with the roar of thunder. It cleaves through enemies with electrifying force, leaving them stunned and disoriented.
Damage: 1d10 slashing + 1d6 thunder
Special Bonus: The Stormbreaker Halberd grants the wielder resistance to lightning damage and allows them to cast the thunderwave spell once per day.]

Flameheart Greatsword:[

Description: This greatsword burns with inner fire, radiating heat and light. It strikes with the fury of a raging inferno, engulfing enemies in flames.
Damage: 2d6 slashing + 1d8 fire
Special Bonus: The Flameheart Greatsword grants the wielder resistance to fire damage and allows them to cast the burning hands spell once per day.]

Frostbite Maul:[

Description: This maul is encased in ice and crackles with frost energy. It shatters enemy defenses with bone-chilling force, leaving them frozen in their tracks.
Damage: 2d8 bludgeoning + 1d6 cold
Special Bonus: The Frostbite Maul grants the wielder resistance to cold damage and allows them to cast the ice knife spell once per day.]

Soulshard Greataxe:[

Description: This greataxe is forged from darksteel and pulses with dark energy. It cleaves through enemies with relentless force, draining their life force with each strike.
Damage: 1d12 slashing + 1d8 necrotic
Special Bonus: The Soulshard Greataxe grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by undead creatures or fiends and allows them to regain hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt on a successful hit once per day.]

Celestial Maul:[

Description: This maul is imbued with divine energy and radiates a holy aura. It smites evil creatures with righteous fury, purging them with celestial fire.
Damage: 2d8 bludgeoning + 1d8 radiant
Special Bonus: The Celestial Maul grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by fiends or undead creatures and allows them to cast the searing smite spell once per day.]

Doombringer Claymore:[

Description: This claymore is etched with infernal runes and radiates an aura of darkness. It strikes fear into the hearts of enemies, draining their life force with each blow.
Damage: 2d8 slashing + 1d6 necrotic
Special Bonus: The Doombringer Claymore grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that cause fear and allows them to cast the inflict wounds spell once per day.]

Ethereal Bastard Sword:[

Description: This bastard sword is infused with the essence of the Ethereal Plane, phasing in and out of reality with each swing. It strikes with otherworldly force, bypassing armor and shields.
Damage: 2d6 slashing + 1d6 force
Special Bonus: The Ethereal Bastard Sword grants the wielder advantage on saving throws against being paralyzed or restrained and allows them to become ethereal for 1 minute once per day, as if affected by the etherealness spell.]

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Ring of Invisibility:[

Description: This silver ring is set with a clear gemstone that seems to shimmer with unseen energies. When worn, it grants the wearer the ability to become invisible at will.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the invisibility spell once per day.]

Amulet of Health:[

Description: This golden amulet is adorned with intricate engravings of healing symbols. When worn, it bestows the wearer with increased vitality and resilience.
Bonus: Increases the wearer's Constitution score by 2, up to a maximum of 20.]

Ring of Teleportation:[

Description: This platinum ring is inscribed with arcane symbols that pulse with magical energy. When worn, it allows the wearer to teleport to a predetermined location once per day.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the teleport spell once per day.]

Necklace of Adaptation:[

Description: This silver necklace is adorned with a small blue gemstone that glows softly. When worn, it grants the wearer the ability to breathe underwater and in other inhospitable environments.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to breathe underwater and in environments without air.]

Ring of Mindshield:[

Description: This iron ring is set with a small black gemstone that seems to absorb thoughts and emotions. When worn, it protects the wearer's mind from detection and intrusion.
Bonus: Grants the wearer immunity to magical detection and location, as well as protection from possession and mental influence.]

Amulet of Hiding:[

Description: This copper amulet is engraved with intricate patterns that seem to shift and change. When worn, it protects the wearer from scrying and magical surveillance.
Bonus: Grants the wearer immunity to magical detection and location spells.]

Ring of Feather Falling:[

Description: This bronze ring is engraved with feather motifs that seem to flutter in an unseen breeze. When worn, it slows the wearer's descent and prevents fall damage.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to descend safely from any height without taking fall damage.]

Necklace of Fireballs:[

Description: This ruby necklace is adorned with multiple small gemstones that resemble miniature fireballs. When activated, it releases a burst of fiery energy.
Bonus: Contains 3 charges. The wearer can expend a charge to cast the fireball spell at 3rd level.]

Ring of Water Walking:[

Description: This steel ring is engraved with wave patterns that seem to ripple and flow. When worn, it allows the wearer to walk on water as if it were solid ground.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to walk on water as if it were solid ground.]

Amulet of the Planes:[

Description: This platinum amulet is inscribed with symbols of the multiverse that seem to shimmer and shift. When worn, it allows the wearer to cast the plane shift spell once per day.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the plane shift spell once per day, allowing them to travel to other planes of existence.]

Ring of Mind Reading:[

Description: This gold ring is adorned with a small sapphire that glows with inner light. When worn, it allows the wearer to read the surface thoughts of creatures within range.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the detect thoughts spell once per day.]

Necklace of Languages:[

Description: This silver necklace is adorned with tiny inscriptions in various languages. When worn, it allows the wearer to comprehend and speak any language.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to comprehend and speak any spoken language.]

Ring of Animal Friendship:[

Description: This brass ring is shaped like a coiled serpent and seems to whisper softly when worn. It allows the wearer to communicate with animals and gain their trust.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on Animal Handling checks and allows them to cast the animal friendship spell once per day.]

Amulet of Truth:[

Description: This onyx amulet is engraved with a single eye that seems to stare into the soul. When worn, it compels the wearer to speak only the truth.
Bonus: Grants the wearer immunity to magical deception and compulsion effects.]

Ring of Timekeeping:[

Description: This silver ring is etched with hourglass motifs that seem to shift and change with the passing of time. When worn, it allows the wearer to accurately track time and predict events.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks to determine the time and date, as well as proficiency in the History skill.]

Ring of Dreamwalking:[

Description: This platinum ring is set with a small opal that seems to shimmer with ethereal light. When worn, it allows the wearer to enter and manipulate dreams.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to enter the dreams of a sleeping creature and communicate with them telepathically.]

Amulet of Safekeeping:[

Description: This emerald amulet is engraved with intricate patterns that seem to ward off danger. When worn, it protects the wearer from harm and ensures their safety.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on saving throws against traps, hazards, and environmental dangers.]

Ring of Fortune:[

Description: This copper ring is set with a small citrine gemstone that glimmers with luck. When worn, it brings good fortune and favorable outcomes to the wearer.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on all saving throws, ability checks, and attack rolls for 1 hour once per day.]

Necklace of Memory:[

Description: This pearl necklace is adorned with delicate filigree that seems to capture memories. When worn, it enhances the wearer's memory and recall abilities.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on Intelligence (History) and Wisdom (Insight) checks, as well as the ability to perfectly recall any information they have previously encountered.]

Ring of Random Teleportation:[

Description: This enchanted ring teleports the wearer to a random location within a 1-mile radius whenever they activate it. It offers unpredictable travel opportunities and potential adventures.
Effect: Allows the wearer to cast the teleport spell once per day, but the destination is determined randomly by the DM.]
