Necklace of Fireballs:[

Description: This ruby necklace is adorned with multiple small gemstones that resemble miniature fireballs. When activated, it releases a burst of fiery energy.
Bonus: Contains 3 charges. The wearer can expend a charge to cast the fireball spell at 3rd level.]

Ring of Water Walking:[

Description: This steel ring is engraved with wave patterns that seem to ripple and flow. When worn, it allows the wearer to walk on water as if it were solid ground.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to walk on water as if it were solid ground.]

Amulet of the Planes:[

Description: This platinum amulet is inscribed with symbols of the multiverse that seem to shimmer and shift. When worn, it allows the wearer to cast the plane shift spell once per day.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the plane shift spell once per day, allowing them to travel to other planes of existence.]

Ring of Mind Reading:[

Description: This gold ring is adorned with a small sapphire that glows with inner light. When worn, it allows the wearer to read the surface thoughts of creatures within range.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the detect thoughts spell once per day.]

Necklace of Languages:[

Description: This silver necklace is adorned with tiny inscriptions in various languages. When worn, it allows the wearer to comprehend and speak any language.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to comprehend and speak any spoken language.]

Ring of Animal Friendship:[

Description: This brass ring is shaped like a coiled serpent and seems to whisper softly when worn. It allows the wearer to communicate with animals and gain their trust.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on Animal Handling checks and allows them to cast the animal friendship spell once per day.]

Amulet of Truth:[

Description: This onyx amulet is engraved with a single eye that seems to stare into the soul. When worn, it compels the wearer to speak only the truth.
Bonus: Grants the wearer immunity to magical deception and compulsion effects.]

Ring of Timekeeping:[

Description: This silver ring is etched with hourglass motifs that seem to shift and change with the passing of time. When worn, it allows the wearer to accurately track time and predict events.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks to determine the time and date, as well as proficiency in the History skill.]

Ring of Dreamwalking:[

Description: This platinum ring is set with a small opal that seems to shimmer with ethereal light. When worn, it allows the wearer to enter and manipulate dreams.
Bonus: Grants the wearer the ability to enter the dreams of a sleeping creature and communicate with them telepathically.]

Amulet of Safekeeping:[

Description: This emerald amulet is engraved with intricate patterns that seem to ward off danger. When worn, it protects the wearer from harm and ensures their safety.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on saving throws against traps, hazards, and environmental dangers.]

Ring of Fortune:[

Description: This copper ring is set with a small citrine gemstone that glimmers with luck. When worn, it brings good fortune and favorable outcomes to the wearer.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on all saving throws, ability checks, and attack rolls for 1 hour once per day.]

Necklace of Memory:[

Description: This pearl necklace is adorned with delicate filigree that seems to capture memories. When worn, it enhances the wearer's memory and recall abilities.
Bonus: Grants the wearer advantage on Intelligence (History) and Wisdom (Insight) checks, as well as the ability to perfectly recall any information they have previously encountered.]

Ring of Random Teleportation:[

Description: This enchanted ring teleports the wearer to a random location within a 1-mile radius whenever they activate it. It offers unpredictable travel opportunities and potential adventures.
Effect: Allows the wearer to cast the teleport spell once per day, but the destination is determined randomly by the DM.]

entries.content:
Blade of Severance:[

Description: This sleek, obsidian longsword gleams with a razor-sharp edge. Its blade hums with anticipation, craving the taste of blood and the thrill of combat.
Base Damage: 3d8 slashing
Hit Chance Bonus: +3 to attack rolls
Effect: On a natural 20 roll, instantly decapitates any creature with less than 100 hit points.]

Eclipse:[

Description: This massive, ebony maul pulses with dark energy and seems to swallow light. It was forged in the heart of a solar eclipse and hungers to crush the forces of light.
Base Damage: 5d6 bludgeoning
Hit Chance Bonus: +3 to attack rolls
Effect: Deals an additional 4d10 necrotic damage on hit and has a chance to blind enemies on a critical hit.]

Aetherial Slicer:[

Description: This elegant, silver rapier appears to shimmer and fade like a mirage. It was crafted by celestial beings to cut through the fabric of reality itself.
Base Damage: 3d8 piercing
Hit Chance Bonus: +4 to attack rolls
Effect: Deals an additional 4d8 force damage on hit and can phase through non-magical barriers.]

Fury's Embrace:[

Description: This massive, thunderous warhammer crackles with electrical energy and echoes with the fury of storms. It was wielded by a legendary giant who could shatter mountains with a single blow.
Base Damage: 4d8 bludgeoning
Hit Chance Bonus: +3 to attack rolls
Effect: Deals an additional 6d8 lightning damage on hit and has a chance to stun enemies on a critical hit.]

Shadowfang:[

Description: Crafted from the shadowy essence of the Plane of Shadow, this obsidian dagger seems to drink in the surrounding darkness. It is favored by assassins and rogues who strike from the shadows.
Attack Stats: Melee: +7 to attack rolls, 3d6 piercing damage
Special Abilities: On a hit, the wielder can choose to deal an additional 2d8 necrotic damage and gain advantage on their next Stealth check. Additionally, once per day, the wielder can cast the pass without trace spell without expending a spell slot.]

Venomstrike:[

Description: Fashioned from the fang of a deadly serpent, this dagger drips with potent venom. It is a favorite weapon of assassins and poisoners who seek to strike down their enemies with deadly precision.
Attack Stats: Melee: +8 to attack rolls, 2d8 piercing damage
Special Abilities: On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute, taking 4d6 poison damage at the start of each of its turns. Additionally, once per day, the wielder can cast the poison spray spell at 4th level without expending a spell slot.]

Worldrend: [
The greataxe that's said to be birthed from the earth's core, its edge sharp enough to split continents and cleave through the barriers of reality itself.
Base Damage: 3d12 slashing
Hit Chance Bonus: +3 to attack rolls
Effect: Each swing generates seismic tremors. On a critical hit, a chasm forms beneath the target, potentially swallowing them whole if they fail a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw.]

Skyscorch Flamberge: [
A sword imbued with the wrath of a thousand storms, its blade arcs with lightning so intense it burns the air it cleaves through.
Base Damage: 3d10 slashing plus 2d6 lightning damage
Hit Chance Bonus: +4 to attack rolls
Effect: Lightning leaps from the blade to strike two additional foes within 30 feet. On a critical hit, it calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 4d10 additional lightning damage and stunning the primary target.]

Mourningstar: [
A mace wrought from a fallen star, sheathed in eternal night. Each strike brings the despair of the void, freezing the very soul of its victims.
Base Damage: 3d8 bludgeoning plus 2d8 cold damage
Hit Chance Bonus: +5 to attack rolls
Effect: Enemies hit are afflicted with frostbite, reducing their speed by half. On a critical hit, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be encased in ice, effectively paralyzed for one round.]

Luminary's Judgement:
[Description: This scepter is crafted from blessed orichalcum, its head encrusted with sacred relics and glowing with inner light. Each strike is the will of the divine made manifest, smiting the wicked with righteous fervor.
Attack Stats: Melee: +6 to attack rolls, 2d6 radiant damage
Unique Bonus: The wielder can channel the light of the divine once per day, calling down a pillar of holy fire that deals 8d8 radiant damage to all foes within a 10-foot radius. Allies within the blast are healed for half the damage dealt to enemies.]

Sacrosanct Malign:
[Description: Forged from a fallen paladin's breastplate, this hammer emanates an aura of self-sacrifice and courage. Its handle is wrapped in a cloth said to be woven from the hair of saints.
Attack Stats: Melee: +5 to attack rolls, 2d8 bludgeoning damage plus 1d6 fire damage
Unique Bonus: Each time the wielder takes damage, the hammer's power grows, adding +1 to damage rolls for each 10 hit points lost. When the wielder's hit points drop below half, they can unleash a 'Martyr's Vengeance,' a nova of fire and light that deals 6d6 fire and 6d6 radiant damage to all enemies within 20 feet.]

Celestium Vow:
[Description: This scepter is forged from a single, flawless diamond that refracts every speck of light into a spectrum of hope. It is the bane of all corruption, a shining symbol of all that is hallowed and pure.
Attack Stats: Melee: +4 to attack rolls, 1d8 bludgeoning damage plus 2d10 radiant damage
Unique Bonus: Once per day, the wielder can cast 'Aura of Purity,' purging all diseases, curses, and poisons affecting allies within 30 feet. Additionally, it can create a 'Sanctuary' barrier once per long rest that shields the wielder and up to six allies from all harm for 1 round.]

Grief:
[This one-handed axe is encased in an eternal shroud of mourning. Crafted from the remains of a vengeful wraith, it craves the sorrow that only death can bring.
Attack Stats: Melee: +4 to attack rolls, 2d6 slashing plus 1d8 necrotic damage
Special Abilities: The axe weeps with the souls it has reaped, bestowing upon the wielder the 'Curse of Anguish'. Each successful strike has a chance to sap the life from enemies, draining 2d10 hit points and adding them to the wielder. Twice per long rest, Grief can unleash a 'Wail of the Damned', an area of effect attack that inflicts 4d10 necrotic damage to all foes within a 20-foot radius and terrifies them into a state of paralysis unless they pass a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw.]

Kingslayer:
[This two-handed sword, forged in regicide and quenched in the blood of monarchs, has a will of its own. It is said to whisper strategies of treachery to its wielder, guiding their hand in battle.
Attack Stats: Melee: +6 to attack rolls, 3d6 slashing damage
Special Abilities: Kingslayer enhances the bearer's natural combat instincts, granting them a precognitive edge in battle. The sword autonomously assists in parries and ripostes, providing the wielder with a permanent +2 to AC. Once per fight, Kingslayer can release the 'Tyrant's Demise', a devastating blow that strikes with the full weight of the fallen; this ethereal attack bypasses armor and shields, automatically crits, and deals triple damage.]

Hellrend:
[From the molten forges beneath the world's crust, this glaive was birthed in flame and baptized in the blood of infernal beasts. Its blade is an obsidian crescent that screams for carnage.
Attack Stats: Melee: +5 to attack rolls, 2d10 slashing damage; Ranged (thrown): +9 to attack rolls, 2d10 piercing damage, range 20/60 ft.
Special Abilities: Hellrend harbors a bound demon's essence within its core. Thrusting or throwing the glaive summons hellfire along its path, dealing an additional 2d6 fire damage and leaving a trail of flames. Three times per long rest, the wielder can invoke 'Infernal Incarnate', enabling Hellrend to summon a fire vortex that engulfs enemies within a 30-foot diameter, dealing 5d8 fire damage and potentially dragging their screaming souls into the abyss unless they make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw.]

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Longbow of Piercing:[

Description: This finely crafted longbow is adorned with silver runes that glow faintly in the moonlight. It strikes with pinpoint accuracy, piercing through armor and barriers.
Base Damage: 1d8 piercing
Special Ability: Ignores half and three-quarters cover.]

Crossbow of Swift Strikes:[

Description: This sleek crossbow is enchanted with lightning runes that crackle with energy. It fires bolts with incredible speed, striking foes before they can react.
Base Damage: 1d10 piercing
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to make an additional attack as a bonus action once per turn.]

Elven Longbow of Accuracy:[

Description: This elegant longbow is crafted from ancient elven wood and adorned with silver filigree. It enhances the wielder's aim and precision, ensuring every shot finds its mark.
Base Damage: 1d8 piercing
Combat Stat: +2 bonus to attack rolls made with this weapon.]

Dwarven Crossbow of Thunder:[

Description: This sturdy crossbow is forged from dwarven steel and etched with thunderous motifs. It unleashes bolts imbued with the power of thunder, shaking foes to their core.
Base Damage: 1d10 piercing
Special Ability: Deals an additional 1d6 thunder damage on a successful hit.]

Composite Longbow of Strength:[

Description: This composite longbow is reinforced with steel bands and crafted for maximum draw weight. It allows even the weakest wielder to unleash powerful shots with ease.
Base Damage: 1d8 piercing
Combat Stat: Allows the wielder to add their Strength modifier to damage rolls made with this weapon.]

Arcane Crossbow of Spellbinding:[

Description: This ornate crossbow is adorned with arcane symbols and infused with magical energy. It fires bolts that entangle and ensnare foes, leaving them vulnerable to further attacks.
Base Damage: 1d10 piercing
Special Ability: Forces the target to make a Wisdom saving throw or become restrained until the end of its next turn.]

Hunting Longbow of Tracking:[

Description: This weathered longbow is stained with the blood of countless prey. It enhances the wielder's tracking abilities, allowing them to follow their quarry with ease.
Base Damage: 1d8 piercing
Special Ability: Grants advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks made to track creatures.]

Shadow Crossbow of Stealth:[

Description: This shadowy crossbow is crafted from darkwood and veiled in darkness. It fires bolts that blend seamlessly into the shadows, striking foes with silent precision.
Base Damage: 1d10 piercing
Special Ability: Grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide after attacking with this weapon.]

Whispering Wind Longbow:[
Description: This longbow is crafted from ethereal wood and strung with a silken thread that hums softly. It seems to bend the air around it, guiding arrows with a whisper.
Damage: 1d8 piercing
Bonuses/Stats/Effects: Arrows fired from this bow ignore half cover and have a +2 bonus to hit. Additionally, once per day, the wielder can fire an arrow that silences the area it strikes for 1 round, preventing any sound within a 10-foot radius.]

Fury of the Maelstrom Short Bow:[
Description: The wood of this bow is encrusted with storm-touched opals, crackling with energy. When an arrow is drawn, sparks dance along the string.
Damage: 1d6 piercing
Bonuses/Stats/Effects: Arrows from this bow carry an electric charge, dealing an additional 1d4 lightning damage. On a critical hit, the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of their next turn.]

Hell's Retort Crossbow:[
Description: Forged in the infernal depths, this crossbow is adorned with runes that glow like coals. It feels unnaturally warm to the touch.
Damage: 1d10 piercing
Bonuses/Stats/Effects: Bolts fired from this crossbow leave a trail of fire, igniting the path they travel and dealing 1d6 fire damage to any in its line. Once per short rest, the wielder can choose to set the bolt ablaze, causing it to explode on impact in a 5-foot radius for an additional 2d6 fire damage.]

Banshee's Wail Slingshot:[
Description: This slingshot is simple in design but has a grip carved from bone that seems to scream when stretched.
Damage: 1d4 bludgeoning
Bonuses/Stats/Effects: Once per day, a stone shot from this slingshot can emit a terrifying wail. Each creature within 30 feet of where the stone lands must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute.]

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Staff of the Arcane:[

Description: This staff is carved from ancient oak and adorned with glowing runes of power. It amplifies the wielder's magical abilities, allowing them to cast spells with greater potency.
Bonus: Increases the wielder's spell attack bonus and spell save DC by +2.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to regain one expended spell slot of 3rd level or lower once per day.]

Wand of Fireballs:[

Description: This wand is crafted from dragonbone and adorned with a ruby at its tip. It unleashes bursts of fiery energy, engulfing enemies in flames.
Bonus: Grants the wielder proficiency in the Firebolt cantrip and the fireball spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the fireball spell at a higher level once per day.]

Staff of Healing:[

Description: This staff is crafted from shimmering crystal and emits a warm, healing light. It channels the power of divine magic, restoring vitality and vigor to the wounded.
Bonus: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells cast by the wielder.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the cure wounds spell at a higher level once per day.]

Wand of Disruption:[

Description: This wand is made from ebony wood and crackles with dark energy. It disrupts the magic of enemy spellcasters, rendering their spells ineffective.
Bonus: Grants advantage on saving throws against spells cast by enemies.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to counterspell enemy spells once per day.]

Staff of the Elements:[

Description: This staff is carved from ancient elemental materials and resonates with the power of the four elements. It allows the wielder to control and manipulate the forces of nature.
Bonus: Grants resistance to a specific elemental damage type.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast spells of the chosen elemental type at a higher level once per day.]

Wand of Teleportation:[

Description: This wand is made from shimmering silver and adorned with sapphire crystals. It bends the fabric of reality, allowing the wielder to teleport across great distances.
Bonus: Grants proficiency in the misty step spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the teleport spell once per day.]

Staff of Illusions:[

Description: This staff is carved from ebony and adorned with opalescent gems. It creates lifelike illusions that deceive the senses and confound enemies.
Bonus: Increases the duration and effectiveness of illusion spells cast by the wielder.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast major image at a higher level once per day.]

Wand of Enchantment:[

Description: This wand is crafted from silver and inscribed with enchanting runes. It imbues objects and creatures with magical properties, compelling them to obey the wielder's commands.
Bonus: Grants advantage on saving throws against spells cast by enemies.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the charm person spell at a higher level once per day.]

Staff of Nature's Wrath:[

Description: This staff is crafted from twisted vines and adorned with leaves that rustle with the whispers of nature. It channels the primal forces of the natural world, unleashing storms and earthquakes.
Bonus: Grants proficiency in the druidcraft cantrip and the call lightning spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the earthquake spell once per day.]

Wand of Time Stop:[

Description: This wand is made from polished mahogany and inscribed with arcane glyphs that shimmer with temporal energy. It bends the flow of time, allowing the wielder to freeze enemies in their tracks.
Bonus: Grants proficiency in the haste spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the time stop spell once per day.]

Staff of Celestial Radiance:[

Description: This staff is crafted from gleaming silver and crowned with a radiant gemstone that glows with inner light. It channels the power of the heavens, banishing darkness and evil.
Bonus: Grants resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the daylight spell once per day.]

Wand of Elemental Fury:[

Description: This wand is made from polished obsidian and crackles with elemental energy. It harnesses the power of the four elements, unleashing devastating storms and cataclysms.
Bonus: Grants proficiency in the control water cantrip and the cone of cold spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the storm of vengeance spell once per day.]

Staff of Shadow Binding:[

Description: This staff is carved from darkwood and adorned with shadowy tendrils that writhe and twist. It binds enemies in darkness, draining their life force and enslaving them to the wielder's will.
Bonus: Grants resistance to necrotic damage.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the finger of death spell once per day.]

Wand of Arcane Insight:[

Description: This wand is made from polished ivory and inscribed with arcane sigils that glow with inner light. It enhances the wielder's understanding of magic, allowing them to penetrate illusions and wards.
Bonus: Grants proficiency in the detect magic cantrip and the identify spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the true seeing spell once per day.]

Staff of Astral Projection:[

Description: This staff is carved from shimmering astral crystal and resonates with the echoes of distant realms. It allows the wielder to project their consciousness into the Astral Plane, exploring otherworldly realms and gathering forbidden knowledge.
Bonus: Grants advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the astral projection spell once per day.]

Wand of Arcane Disjunction:[

Description: This wand is crafted from blackened iron and etched with runes of dispelling. It disrupts enemy spells and wards, unraveling magical effects with a single touch.
Bonus: Grants proficiency in the dispel magic spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the antimagic field spell once per day.]

Scepter of the Devouring Sands:
[Description: This scepter is topped with a swirling hourglass, filled with sands that appear to consume the light around them.
Damage: 1d6 + 2 necrotic
Bonuses/Stats/Effects: When a creature is hit with this scepter, the sands within the hourglass animate, leeching life force from the victim. The wielder gains temporary hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt. Once per long rest, the wielder can cast sandstorm, a spell that blinds and deals 2d6 slashing damage to all in its radius for 1 minute unless they succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw.]

Wand of Whispers:
[Description: Crafted from blackened willow, this wand is adorned with a silvery filigree that seems to pulse with a life of its own.
Damage: 1d4 psychic
Bonuses/Stats/Effects: The wand allows the wielder to cast message at will. Additionally, once per short rest, the wielder can cast psychic scream, dealing 1d8 psychic damage and potentially stunning the target if it fails a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw.]

Staff of Withering Thorns:
[Description: This gnarled blackthorn staff is adorned with twisted vines that seem to quiver with a hunger for life.
Damage: 1d8 piercing
Bonuses/Stats/Effects: On a successful hit, the staff’s thorns drain the vitality of its target, dealing an additional 1d4 necrotic damage. The wielder can use an action to unleash a barrage of thorns in a 20-foot cone, requiring each creature in the area to make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 piercing damage and become poisoned until the end of their next turn. Once used, this ability can’t be used again until the next dawn.]

Cane of Capricious Conjuring:
[Description: Crafted from warped yew wood, this cane is capped with a crystal orb filled with swirling, chaotic mist.
Damage: 1d6 bludgeoning
Bonuses/Stats/Effects: The cane has 7 charges for the following properties. It regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. Spells cast from the cane use the wielder’s spell attack bonus and spell save DC.

Fog Cloud (1 charge)
Misty Step (2 charges)
Conjure Elemental (5 charges, conjures a random elemental)
If all charges are expended, roll a d20. On a 1, the cane vanishes in a puff of multicolored smoke, reappearing in a random location on the same plane of existence.]

Brazier Staff of Infernal Bargains:
[Description: This staff, forged from black iron and adorned with demonic runes, holds a brazier that burns with an otherworldly flame.
Damage: 1d6 fire
Bonuses/Stats/Effects: The wielder may use an action to speak the true name of a demon inscribed on the staff, summoning it to make a bargain. The brazier flares up, and the demon appears in a burst of brimstone, ready to negotiate. The specifics of the bargain are determined by the wielder and the DM but should carry significant risk. After the bargain is struck or if the demon is dismissed without agreement, it can’t be summoned again until the next new moon.]
entries.entry:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Staff of the Arcane:[

Description: This staff is carved from ancient oak and adorned with glowing runes of power. It amplifies the wielder's magical abilities, allowing them to cast spells with greater potency.
Bonus: Increases the wielder's spell attack bonus and spell save DC by +2.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to regain one expended spell slot of 3rd level or lower once per day.]

Wand of Fireballs:[

Description: This wand is crafted from dragonbone and adorned with a ruby at its tip. It unleashes bursts of fiery energy, engulfing enemies in flames.
Bonus: Grants the wielder proficiency in the Firebolt cantrip and the fireball spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the fireball spell at a higher level once per day.]

Staff of Healing:[

Description: This staff is crafted from shimmering crystal and emits a warm, healing light. It channels the power of divine magic, restoring vitality and vigor to the wounded.
Bonus: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells cast by the wielder.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the cure wounds spell at a higher level once per day.]

Wand of Disruption:[

Description: This wand is made from ebony wood and crackles with dark energy. It disrupts the magic of enemy spellcasters, rendering their spells ineffective.
Bonus: Grants advantage on saving throws against spells cast by enemies.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to counterspell enemy spells once per day.]

Staff of the Elements:[

Description: This staff is carved from ancient elemental materials and resonates with the power of the four elements. It allows the wielder to control and manipulate the forces of nature.
Bonus: Grants resistance to a specific elemental damage type.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast spells of the chosen elemental type at a higher level once per day.]

Wand of Teleportation:[

Description: This wand is made from shimmering silver and adorned with sapphire crystals. It bends the fabric of reality, allowing the wielder to teleport across great distances.
Bonus: Grants proficiency in the misty step spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the teleport spell once per day.]

Staff of Illusions:[

Description: This staff is carved from ebony and adorned with opalescent gems. It creates lifelike illusions that deceive the senses and confound enemies.
Bonus: Increases the duration and effectiveness of illusion spells cast by the wielder.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast major image at a higher level once per day.]

Wand of Enchantment:[

Description: This wand is crafted from silver and inscribed with enchanting runes. It imbues objects and creatures with magical properties, compelling them to obey the wielder's commands.
Bonus: Grants advantage on saving throws against spells cast by enemies.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the charm person spell at a higher level once per day.]

Staff of Nature's Wrath:[

Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the earthquake spell once per day.]

Bonus: Grants resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the daylight spell once per day.]

Bonus: Grants proficiency in the control water cantrip and the cone of cold spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the storm of vengeance spell once per day.]

Bonus: Grants resistance to necrotic damage.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the finger of death spell once per day.]

Bonus: Grants proficiency in the detect magic cantrip and the identify spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the true seeing spell once per day.]

Description: This staff is carved from shimmering astral crystal and resonates with the echoes of distant realms. It allows the wielder to project their consciousness into the Astral Plane, exploring otherworldly realms and gathering forbidden knowledge.
Bonus: Grants advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the astral projection spell once per day.]

Description: This wand is crafted from blackened iron and etched with runes of dispelling. It disrupts enemy spells and wards, unraveling magical effects with a single touch.
Bonus: Grants proficiency in the dispel magic spell.
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to cast the antimagic field spell once per day.]

Damage: 1d6 + 2 necrotic

The wielder gains temporary hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt. [Description: Crafted from blackened willow, this wand is adorned with a silvery filigree that seems to pulse with a life of its own.
Damage: 1d4 psychic

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Shield of Protection:[

Description: This shield is forged from shining steel and emblazoned with holy symbols. It wards off attacks with divine protection, shielding the wielder from harm.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.]

Guardian Shield:[

Description: This shield is crafted from ancient oak and reinforced with bands of mithril. It channels the protective energies of nature, shielding the wielder from harm.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.]

Shield of Reflection:[

Description: This shield is made from polished silver and adorned with reflective surfaces. It deflects incoming attacks with uncanny precision, turning aside projectiles and spells.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to reflect one ranged attack or spell back at the attacker per day.]

Warding Shield:[

Description: This shield is etched with intricate warding runes that shimmer with protective magic. It creates a barrier of arcane energy that absorbs incoming attacks.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants temporary hit points equal to the wielder's Constitution modifier at the start of each turn.]

Shield of Elemental Resistance:[

Description: This shield is crafted from shimmering elemental materials and resonates with the power of the four elements. It grants protection against elemental attacks.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants resistance to a specific elemental damage type, chosen by the wielder.]

Spectral Shield:[

Description: This shield is made from translucent crystal and seems to shimmer with otherworldly light. It phases in and out of existence, providing ethereal protection.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Allows the wielder to become incorporeal for a brief moment, avoiding all damage from one attack per day.]

Shield of the Valiant:[

Description: This shield is adorned with noble motifs and bears the insignia of a legendary knight. It inspires courage and resilience in the wielder and their allies.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants advantage on saving throws against fear effects and charm effects.]

Sentinel Shield:[

Description: This shield is carved from enchanted stone and adorned with glowing runes of vigilance. It grants enhanced awareness and foresight to the wielder.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks.]

Shield of the Phoenix:[

Description: This shield is crafted from fiery phoenix feathers and radiates warmth and light. It protects the wielder with the eternal flame of rebirth.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants resistance to fire damage and allows the wielder to resurrect once per day upon reaching 0 hit points.]

Aegis of the Storm:[

Description: This shield crackles with electricity and echoes with the roar of thunder. It harnesses the power of the storm, shielding the wielder with its wrath.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants resistance to lightning damage and allows the wielder to cast the thunderwave spell once per day.]

Shadowguard Shield:[

Description: This shield is made from shadowy obsidian and seems to absorb light around it. It cloaks the wielder in darkness, concealing their movements and intentions.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and allows the wielder to cast the darkness spell once per day.]

Shield of the Astral Warden:[

Description: This shield is adorned with celestial motifs and seems to shimmer with starlight. It wards off extraplanar threats, protecting the wielder from otherworldly dangers.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants resistance to force damage and allows the wielder to banish one extraplanar creature per day.]

Guardian's Bulwark:[

Description: This shield is emblazoned with the crest of an ancient order of protectors. It inspires loyalty and camaraderie in the wielder's allies, strengthening their resolve.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants temporary hit points to allies within 10 feet of the wielder equal to their Charisma modifier at the start of each turn.]

Shield of the Searing Sands:[

Description: This shield is forged from golden sandstone and radiates intense heat. It protects the wielder from desert heat and sandstorms, granting resilience in arid environments.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical sources and allows the wielder to cast the endure elements spell once per day.]

Warden's Ward:[

Description: This shield is carved from ancient petrified wood and engraved with protective sigils. It channels the strength of the earth, grounding the wielder and providing stability in combat.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants advantage on saving throws against being knocked prone or moved against the wielder's will.]

Shield of the Eternal Guardian:[

Description: This shield is adorned with celestial motifs and seems to radiate with divine energy. It grants protection against undead and fiendish creatures, repelling their malevolent influence.
AC Modifier: +2
Special Ability: Grants advantage on saving throws against spells and effects cast by undead or fiends and allows the wielder to cast the protection from evil and good spell once per day.]

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Boots of Fleetness:[

Description: These sleek leather boots are enchanted with the spirit of swiftness, allowing the wearer to move with unparalleled speed and agility.
Effect: Grants advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) and Dexterity (Athletics) checks related to movement, and increases the wearer's movement speed by 10 feet.]

Hat of Disguise:[

Description: This stylish hat is adorned with feathers and ribbons, imbued with the power of illusion. It allows the wearer to change their appearance at will, assuming different forms and disguises.
Effect: Allows the wearer to cast the disguise self spell at will.]

Gloves of Dexterity:[

Description: These supple leather gloves enhance the wearer's manual dexterity and precision, granting them greater skill in tasks requiring fine motor control.
Effect: Grants a +2 bonus to Dexterity checks and allows the wearer to reroll any 1s rolled on skill checks involving manual dexterity.]

Orb of Augury:[

Description: This crystal orb hums with mystical energy, providing glimpses of the future to those who seek its guidance. It allows the user to peer into the fabric of destiny and gain insights into upcoming events.
Effect: Allows the user to cast the augury spell once per day.]

Pipe of Smoke Tricks:[

Description: This intricately carved pipe exudes an enchanting aroma and produces billowing clouds of fragrant smoke. It enhances the user's creativity and charm, allowing them to captivate audiences with mesmerizing smoke tricks.
Effect: Grants advantage on Charisma (Performance) checks when performing smoke tricks, and allows the user to cast the fog cloud spell once per day.]

Hourglass of Timekeeping:[

Description: This ornate hourglass is filled with shimmering sand that flows with the passage of time. It allows the user to accurately measure the passage of time and manipulate time-related effects.
Effect: Grants advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks related to time-related puzzles or mysteries, and allows the user to cast the alarm spell once per day.]

Chalice of Endless Refreshment:[

Description: This exquisite chalice is always filled with cool, refreshing liquid, regardless of how much is consumed. It quenches the thirst of the user and provides sustenance in even the harshest environments.
Effect: Automatically refills with fresh water or another non-alcoholic beverage of the user's choice once per hour, and provides advantage on Constitution saving throws against dehydration.]

Spectacles of Truth:[

Description: These spectacles are crafted from polished crystal and adorned with intricate filigree. They grant the wearer the ability to see through illusions and falsehoods, revealing hidden truths.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the true seeing spell once per day.]

Bag of Everlasting Popcorn:[

Description: This enchanted bag is always filled with freshly popped popcorn, regardless of how much is consumed. It provides a tasty and satisfying snack for the user and their companions.
Effect: Automatically refills with freshly popped popcorn once per hour, and provides advantage on Constitution saving throws against hunger.]

Earring of Translation:[

Description: This intricately crafted earring allows the wearer to understand and speak any language, facilitating communication with creatures of all races and cultures.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to comprehend and communicate in any spoken language.]

Goblet of Bottomless Cheer:[

Description: This enchanted goblet is always filled with sparkling champagne, regardless of how much is consumed. It lifts the spirits of the user and their companions, instilling feelings of joy and celebration.
Effect: Automatically refills with sparkling champagne once per hour, and provides advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks during social interactions.]

Mask of Mimicry:[

Description: This mask is carved from wood and adorned with feathery plumes. It grants the wearer the ability to mimic the appearance and sounds of any creature or object they have observed.
Effect: Allows the wearer to cast the disguise self spell at will, with no concentration required.]

Socks of Sudden Speed:[

Description: These mismatched socks grant the wearer sudden bursts of incredible speed, causing them to dash uncontrollably in random directions.
Effect: Once per day, the wearer's movement speed is doubled for 1 minute, but they must roll a d20 at the start of each turn. On a roll of 1, they dash uncontrollably in a random direction for that turn.]

Frog's Kiss Lip Balm:[

Description: This enchanted lip balm transforms the wearer's lips into those of a frog, allowing them to deliver a magical kiss that can turn creatures into frogs.
Effect: Once per day, the wearer can attempt to kiss a creature within 5 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be polymorphed into a frog for 1 hour.]

Hat of Talking Animals:[

Description: This whimsical hat allows the wearer to communicate with animals, but it also causes the wearer to emit animal noises uncontrollably.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the speak with animals spell at will, but they also emit random animal noises (such as meowing, barking, or clucking) at inappropriate times.]

Flamingo Feather Boa:[

Description: This flamboyant feather boa is adorned with vibrant flamingo feathers that grant the wearer the ability to walk on water, but only while striking a pose.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to walk on water as long as they are striking a dramatic pose and wearing the boa. The effect ends if they stop posing.]

Nose of Infinite Sneezing:[

Description: This enchanted nose constantly emits a cloud of magical pollen, causing anyone nearby to suffer uncontrollable sneezing fits.
Effect: Once per day, the wearer can unleash a cloud of magical pollen in a 30-foot radius. Creatures caught in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated for 1 minute due to sneezing fits.]

Glasses of Perpetual Squinting:[

Description: These magical glasses cause the wearer's eyes to squint perpetually, but they also grant the ability to see invisible creatures and objects.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to see invisible creatures and objects within 60 feet, but they also squint constantly, imposing disadvantage on Perception checks that rely on vision.]

Dancing Shoes of Chaotic Choreography:[

Description: These enchanted shoes compel the wearer to dance uncontrollably, causing them to perform chaotic and unpredictable dance moves.
Effect: Once per day, the wearer is compelled to dance uncontrollably for 1 minute. While dancing, they have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks but disadvantage on all other ability checks.]

Cup of Confounding Conversations:[

Description: This enchanted cup causes the words of the wearer and those around them to become jumbled and incomprehensible, leading to confusing conversations.
Effect: Once per day, when the wearer speaks, their words become jumbled and incomprehensible for 1 minute. Any creature attempting to communicate with the wearer must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or become confused for 1 minute.]

Candle of Incessant Gabbing:[
Description: A seemingly innocent wax candle, but once lit, it causes everyone in its vicinity to speak nothing but the truth, no matter how humiliating or secret.
Effect: When lit, the candle compels all within a 20-foot radius to speak only the truth for 10 minutes. Those within range must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to speak anything but their innermost thoughts and secrets.]

Whistle of Discord:[
Description: This small, silver whistle emits a sound only heard by a select few, sowing seeds of discord and suspicion among those who hear its call.
Effect: The whistle can be blown once per day. Those targeted by the user must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or become paranoid and distrustful of their closest allies for an hour.]

Vial of Endless Giggles:[
Description: A tiny glass vial filled with a potion that, when consumed, causes an uncontrollable fit of giggles at the most inopportune moments.
Effect: After drinking, the character cannot stop giggling for the next hour, suffering disadvantage on Stealth and Concentration checks due to the fits of laughter.]

Quill of Exaggerated Lore:[
Description: A magnificent feather quill that embellishes the writer's words, turning the most mundane of stories into epic tales.
Effect: When used to write any account or description, the quill exaggerates details to legendary proportions, potentially misleading anyone who reads the text. Once per day, it can cast the illusory script spell without requiring material components.]

Dust of Directional Disarray:[
Description: A pouch of sparkling dust that, when thrown into the air, causes disorientation and impairs one's sense of direction.
Effect: The dust can be deployed once per day. Targets within a 10-foot radius must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or become disoriented, moving in random directions for the next 10 minutes.]
entries.entry:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Boots of Fleetness:[

Description: These sleek leather boots are enchanted with the spirit of swiftness, allowing the wearer to move with unparalleled speed and agility.
Effect: Grants advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) and Dexterity (Athletics) checks related to movement, and increases the wearer's movement speed by 10 feet.]

Hat of Disguise:[

Description: This stylish hat is adorned with feathers and ribbons, imbued with the power of illusion. It allows the wearer to change their appearance at will, assuming different forms and disguises.
Effect: Allows the wearer to cast the disguise self spell at will.]

Gloves of Dexterity:[

Description: These supple leather gloves enhance the wearer's manual dexterity and precision, granting them greater skill in tasks requiring fine motor control.
Effect: Grants a +2 bonus to Dexterity checks and allows the wearer to reroll any 1s rolled on skill checks involving manual dexterity.]

Orb of Augury:[

Description: This crystal orb hums with mystical energy, providing glimpses of the future to those who seek its guidance. It allows the user to peer into the fabric of destiny and gain insights into upcoming events.
Effect: Allows the user to cast the augury spell once per day.]

Pipe of Smoke Tricks:[

Description: This intricately carved pipe exudes an enchanting aroma and produces billowing clouds of fragrant smoke. It enhances the user's creativity and charm, allowing them to captivate audiences with mesmerizing smoke tricks.
Effect: Grants advantage on Charisma (Performance) checks when performing smoke tricks, and allows the user to cast the fog cloud spell once per day.]

Hourglass of Timekeeping:[

Description: This ornate hourglass is filled with shimmering sand that flows with the passage of time. It allows the user to accurately measure the passage of time and manipulate time-related effects.
Effect: Grants advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks related to time-related puzzles or mysteries, and allows the user to cast the alarm spell once per day.]

Chalice of Endless Refreshment:[

Description: This exquisite chalice is always filled with cool, refreshing liquid, regardless of how much is consumed. It quenches the thirst of the user and provides sustenance in even the harshest environments.
Effect: Automatically refills with fresh water or another non-alcoholic beverage of the user's choice once per hour, and provides advantage on Constitution saving throws against dehydration.]

Spectacles of Truth:[

Description: These spectacles are crafted from polished crystal and adorned with intricate filigree. They grant the wearer the ability to see through illusions and falsehoods, revealing hidden truths.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the true seeing spell once per day.]

Bag of Everlasting Popcorn:[

Description: This enchanted bag is always filled with freshly popped popcorn, regardless of how much is consumed. It provides a tasty and satisfying snack for the user and their companions.
Effect: Automatically refills with freshly popped popcorn once per hour, and provides advantage on Constitution saving throws against hunger.]

Earring of Translation:[

Description: This intricately crafted earring allows the wearer to understand and speak any language, facilitating communication with creatures of all races and cultures.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to comprehend and communicate in any spoken language.]

Goblet of Bottomless Cheer:[

Description: This enchanted goblet is always filled with sparkling champagne, regardless of how much is consumed. It lifts the spirits of the user and their companions, instilling feelings of joy and celebration.
Effect: Automatically refills with sparkling champagne once per hour, and provides advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks during social interactions.]

Mask of Mimicry:[

Description: This mask is carved from wood and adorned with feathery plumes. It grants the wearer the ability to mimic the appearance and sounds of any creature or object they have observed.
Effect: Allows the wearer to cast the disguise self spell at will, with no concentration required.]

Socks of Sudden Speed:[

Description: These mismatched socks grant the wearer sudden bursts of incredible speed, causing them to dash uncontrollably in random directions.
Effect: Once per day, the wearer's movement speed is doubled for 1 minute, but they must roll a d20 at the start of each turn. On a roll of 1, they dash uncontrollably in a random direction for that turn.]

Frog's Kiss Lip Balm:[

Description: This enchanted lip balm transforms the wearer's lips into those of a frog, allowing them to deliver a magical kiss that can turn creatures into frogs.
Effect: Once per day, the wearer can attempt to kiss a creature within 5 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be polymorphed into a frog for 1 hour.]

Hat of Talking Animals:[

Description: This whimsical hat allows the wearer to communicate with animals, but it also causes the wearer to emit animal noises uncontrollably.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to cast the speak with animals spell at will, but they also emit random animal noises (such as meowing, barking, or clucking) at inappropriate times.]

Flamingo Feather Boa:[

Description: This flamboyant feather boa is adorned with vibrant flamingo feathers that grant the wearer the ability to walk on water, but only while striking a pose.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to walk on water as long as they are striking a dramatic pose and wearing the boa. The effect ends if they stop posing.]

Nose of Infinite Sneezing:[

Description: This enchanted nose constantly emits a cloud of magical pollen, causing anyone nearby to suffer uncontrollable sneezing fits.
Effect: Once per day, the wearer can unleash a cloud of magical pollen in a 30-foot radius. Creatures caught in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated for 1 minute due to sneezing fits.]

Glasses of Perpetual Squinting:[

Description: These magical glasses cause the wearer's eyes to squint perpetually, but they also grant the ability to see invisible creatures and objects.
Effect: Grants the wearer the ability to see invisible creatures and objects within 60 feet, but they also squint constantly, imposing disadvantage on Perception checks that rely on vision.]

Dancing Shoes of Chaotic Choreography:[

Description: These enchanted shoes compel the wearer to dance uncontrollably, causing them to perform chaotic and unpredictable dance moves.
Effect: Once per day, the wearer is compelled to dance uncontrollably for 1 minute. While dancing, they have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks but disadvantage on all other ability checks.]

Cup of Confounding Conversations:[

Description: This enchanted cup causes the words of the wearer and those around them to become jumbled and incomprehensible, leading to confusing conversations.
Effect: Once per day, when the wearer speaks, their words become jumbled and incomprehensible for 1 minute. Any creature attempting to communicate with the wearer must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or become confused for 1 minute.]

Candle of Incessant Gabbing:[
Description: A seemingly innocent wax candle, but once lit, it causes everyone in its vicinity to speak nothing but the truth, no matter how humiliating or secret.
Effect: When lit, the candle compels all within a 20-foot radius to speak only the truth for 10 minutes. Those within range must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to speak anything but their innermost thoughts and secrets.]

Whistle of Discord:[
Description: This small, silver whistle emits a sound only heard by a select few, sowing seeds of discord and suspicion among those who hear its call.
Effect: The whistle can be blown once per day. Those targeted by the user must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or become paranoid and distrustful of their closest allies for an hour.]

Vial of Endless Giggles:[
Description: A tiny glass vial filled with a potion that, when consumed, causes an uncontrollable fit of giggles at the most inopportune moments.
Effect: After drinking, the character cannot stop giggling for the next hour, suffering disadvantage on Stealth and Concentration checks due to the fits of laughter.]

Quill of Exaggerated Lore:[
Description: A magnificent feather quill that embellishes the writer's words, turning the most mundane of stories into epic tales.
Effect: When used to write any account or description, the quill exaggerates details to legendary proportions, potentially misleading anyone who reads the text. Once per day, it can cast the illusory script spell without requiring material components.]

Dust of Directional Disarray:[
Description: A pouch of sparkling dust that, when thrown into the air, causes disorientation and impairs one's sense of direction.
Effect: The dust can be deployed once per day. Targets within a 10-foot radius must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or become disoriented, moving in random directions for the next 10 minutes.]

entries.content:
Tenebromancer:[

Description: Forged in the deepest chasms of the Underworld, this nefarious plate armor is layered with scales from the hide of an Abyssal Titan. Each plate seems to ripple with a darkness that devours light and hope alike.
Armor Class: 23
Special Abilities: The wearer becomes an unyielding fortress. The armor grants immunity to fear effects and resistance to both physical and magical damage. Once per day, it lets out a devastating roar that forces adversaries to make a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for one minute.]

Pyresong:[
Description: Woven from the ashes and reborn feathers of a phoenix, this chain mail armor glows with an ethereal flame that protects and rejuvenates. Its warm touch is a balm to the wounds and spirits of its wearer.
Armor Class: 21
Special Abilities: The wearer gains resistance to fire damage and advantage on saving throws against death effects. If the wearer is reduced to 0 hit points, they are immediately restored to 50% of their hit points and the armor disintegrates, only to reform on the wearer after 7 days.]

Aquaflect:[

Description: This heavy plate armor is assembled from the impenetrable shell of a mighty Leviathan. Its cerulean sheen mesmerizes those who gaze upon it, while its nigh indestructible nature turns aside the sharpest of blades.
Armor Class: 22
Special Abilities: The wearer gains the ability to breathe underwater and swim at high speeds. They gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons. In addition, once per day, they can unleash a torrential blast of water to knock enemies back and deal significant water damage.]

Whispershade:[

Description: A rogue's second skin, crafted from the hides of creatures that have never known the sun's caress. Imbued with darkness itself, this leather armor melds with the shadows, hugging the wearer like a lover's embrace.
Armor Class: 17
Special Abilities: Grants the wearer permanent advantage on Stealth checks. Any sneak attack deals extra necrotic damage equal to the rogue's level. Once per long rest, the wearer can become invisible for one minute, allowing them to move unseen or slip away from the clingy hands of death.]

Thornweave:[

Description: This leather armor is birthed from the heart of the oldest forest where the trees whisper secrets of old. The leather is interlaced with living vines that pulse with the very essence of nature.
Armor Class: 18
Special Abilities: The wearer gains resistance to poison and advantage on all saving throws against magic of elemental origin. Thrive on Druidic power; once per day, conjure a thicket that ensnares and damages foes, adding some piercing damage as the vines do their vicious dance.]

Skyrend:[

Description: Forged from a blend of mythril and arcane-infused metals, this chain mail is lighter than a feather and tough as an ancient dragon's hide. Each link is etched with sigils to steady the hand and clear the eye.
Armor Class: 16
Special Abilities: Improves ranged attack rolls by +2. The hauberk can absorb a spell cast against the wearer once per day, nullifying it and turning its energy into a charge for their next attack. Ever been hit by your own fireball? Your enemies are about to.]

Sanguisar:
[Description: A suit of plate armor smelted in the forges of Hell and bathed in the blood of the archdemons. The crimson plates are etched with runes that weep with the agonies of the damned, empowering the wearer with infernal might.
Armor Class: 24
Special Abilities: The wearer becomes the embodiment of terror on the battlefield, radiating an aura that paralyzes foes with dread. Grants immunity to fire and poison damage, and the ability to call forth a demonic entity once per day to fight alongside the wearer for one hour. The summoned demon obeys without question, reveling in the chaos it's summoned to sow.]

Resonox:
[Description: This plate armor set is said to be crafted from the very essence of sound within the haunted catacombs beneath the world. It resonates with a spectral chorus that harmonizes with the wearer's movements, creating a symphony of protection.
Armor Class: 22
Special Abilities: Wearer gains sonar-like awareness, granting tremorsense up to 60 feet. The clashing of steel against this armor amplifies and disorients attackers, giving them disadvantage on all subsequent attacks for one round. Additionally, the wearer can unleash a deafening blast three times per day, dealing 3d10 thunder damage to all within a 20-foot radius and potentially stunning them with a failed DC 17 Constitution saving throw.]

Ripsaw Requiem:
[A leather armor set tailored for the agile brawler who dives deep into enemy ranks. The hide, once belonging to a monstrous wereboar, still yearns for the clash of battle.
Armor Class: 18
Special Abilities: Enchants the wearer with feral might, granting additional damage on all melee strikes and reducing incoming damage when below half health. The armor can unleash a bestial roar thrice per day, forcing enemies to save or be knocked prone.]

Blackquill:
[This sleek set of leather armor is crafted from the hide of a sky serpent, known for striking its prey from leagues away.
Armor Class: 16
Special Abilities: Enhances the wearer's precision, adding a deadly aim that turns critical hits into grievous wounds. On a successful hit, the armor can generate a gust that pushes the target back. Once per day, it can cast 'Far Sight,' extending the wearer's range and vision fourfold for a short time.]

Verdantheart:
[Constructed from enchanted barkskin and interlaced with vibrant moss, this armor nurtures as it protects.
Armor Class: 17
Special Abilities: Confers upon the wearer an aura of regeneration, slowly healing allies within a small radius. The armor can bloom once per day, enveloping the area in restorative spores that hasten wound closure and purge toxins.]

entries.comment: Unique Magic Items - Robes and Cloth
entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Soulwarden's Raiment:[
Description: Ethereal threads infused with souls long past shimmer with an otherworldly aura, these robes offer sanctuary to the wearer amidst the chaos of battle.
Armor Class: 18
Special Abilities: Renders the caster nearly untouchable by mortal means, increasing their spell save DC by 4 and granting them the ability to, once per day, negate any spell targeted at them as if it never was.]

Druidheart Wrap:[
Description: Wrought from the World Tree's own heartwood fibers, this robe thrums with the raw essence of life itself, a constant companion to those who speak for the wild.
Armor Class: 19
Special Abilities: Allows the druid to meld into nature, becoming invisible in natural settings, and thrice per day the wrap can unleash a devastating burst of primal energy that heals allies and harms foes alike within a wide radius.]

Starweave Shroud:[
Description: Crafted from silks spun by the celestial arachnids of the astral plane, this robe glows with starlight, its wearer bathed in the cosmos' brilliance.
Armor Class: 17
Special Abilities: Bolsters the wearer's arcane arsenal by granting an additional spell slot for each spell level up to 5th, and once per day, allows the casting of a spell without verbal, somatic, or material components, as if the cosmos itself casts through them.]

Arcanist's Gambit:[
Description: Resplendent robes with ever-shifting runes, this attire adapts its protective enchantments in response to impending arcane threats, turning a would-be lethal spell into little more than a light show.
Armor Class: 18
Special Abilities: Automatically counters the first offensive spell targeting the wearer each day, and amplifies the wearer's next spell with a surge of arcane feedback.]

Diviner's Eclipse:[
Description: Midnight blue robes and stitched with constellations, this attire is as mysterious as time itself, allowing the wearer to tap into the ebb and flow of fate's currents.
Armor Class: 17
Special Abilities: Grants the ability to peer seconds into the future, providing advantage on all initiative rolls and saving throws, and allows the wearer to cast 'foresight' once per week.]

Invoker's Ire:[
Description: Seething with contained fury, these robes crackle with raw elemental power, ready to unleash hell at the merest thought from its master.
Armor Class: 17
Special Abilities: The wearer may call forth an elemental ally once per day, and can wrap themselves in a cloak of their chosen element, granting them immunity to that type while radiating damage to any who dare come too close.]

Serra's Mercy:[
Description: Bathed in divine light, these vestments are stitched with sacred threads that resonate with the heartbeat of creation, offering both protection and potent restorative capabilities.
Armor Class: 19
Special Abilities: Wearer gains an aura of healing, restoring hit points to allies within a radius at the start of the wearer's turn. Once per day, can cast 'mass heal' to bring allies back from the brink of death.]

Mantle of the Tranquil Guardian:[
Description: Radiating calm amid the storm of conflict, this cloak is woven from the essence of protective wards, providing unyielding defense and solace to those under its wearer's watchful gaze.
Armor Class: 17
Special Abilities: The wearer can extend a shield of sanctuary around them, granting temporary hit points to nearby allies and reducing damage from enemy attacks. Once per long rest, the wearer can envelop allies in a protective barrier, granting immunity to damage for a single turn.]

Harmonizer's Threads:[
Description: These robes hum with a soothing frequency that aligns with the life forces of the wearer and their comrades, fostering resilience and rapid recovery from injuries both minor and grievous.
Armor Class: 18
Special Abilities: The wearer’s healing spells are maximized, always yielding the highest possible rolls. Additionally, once between long rests, they can channel pure life force to remove all conditions affecting a target and restore them to full health.]

Cloak of the Voidstalker:[
For those sneaky bastards who thrive in the shadows, this cloak is like a gateway to damnation itself, perfect for the rogues who fancy a bit of void in their step.
Armor Class: +1 to existing armor
Special Abilities: Grants the wearer advantage on all Stealth checks and allows them to meld into shadows, becoming invisible as an action twice per long rest.]

Gladekeeper:[
Woven from the essence of the oldest trees, this one's for the druids who speak with the wind and walk with the beasts, a real nature-lover's dream.
Armor Class: +2 to existing armor
Special Abilities: Once per day, the wearer can call upon the spirits of nature, healing themselves and allies for a significant amount and granting resistance to elemental damage for 10 minutes.]

Arcanum Enshroudment:[
Enchanted with the purest of magicks, this one's like a warm blanket for your wizards, sorcerers, and the like, made from the stuff of raw, unbridled power.
Armor Class: +2 to existing armor
Special Abilities: Provides the wearer with a permanent minor spell resistance and the ability to absorb and store a spell of up to 5th level, releasing it later at their command once per long rest.]

Celestial Mantle:[
This cloak, woven from the ethereal strands found only in the fabric of the Astral Plane, not only offers protection but commands the respect of celestial entities themselves.
Armor Class: +3 to existing armor
Special Abilities: Bestows upon the wearer immunity to psychic and radiant damage; once per day, they can invoke the power of the stars to automatically succeed on any saving throw.]

Fiend's Embrace:[
Fashioned from the tanned hide of a legendary demon, this cloak pulsates with an intimidating aura of dread, granting the wearer dominance in the battlefield.
Armor Class: +3 to existing armor
Special Abilities: Enemies within sight must make a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed with fear, and the cloak can absorb the life force of fallen foes to heal the wearer.]

Primeval Sentinel:[
A treasure bestowed only upon those who prove themselves as true protectors of the natural world, this cloak is as ancient as it is powerful, shielding its bearer from the ravages of time and combat.
Armor Class: +4 to existing armor
Special Abilities: The wearer becomes resistant to all physical damage, can enter a stasis once per day to fully regenerate health, and is granted the wisdom of the ancients, providing advantage on all Intelligence and Wisdom checks.]

Special Abilities: Grants the wearer advantage on all Stealth checks and allows them to meld into shadows, becoming invisible as an action twice per long rest.]

Gladekeeper:[
Woven from the essence of the oldest trees, this one's for the druids who speak with the wind and walk with the beasts, a real nature-lover's dream.
Armor Class: +2 to existing armor
Special Abilities: Once per day, the wearer can call upon the spirits of nature, healing themselves and allies for a significant amount and granting resistance to elemental damage for 10 minutes.]

Arcanum Enshroudment:[
Enchanted with the purest of magicks, this one's like a warm blanket for your wizards, sorcerers, and the like, made from the stuff of raw, unbridled power.
Armor Class: +2 to existing armor
Special Abilities: Provides the wearer with a permanent minor spell resistance and the ability to absorb and store a spell of up to 5th level, releasing it later at their command once per long rest.]

Celestial Mantle:[
This cloak, woven from the ethereal strands found only in the fabric of the Astral Plane, not only offers protection but commands the respect of celestial entities themselves.
Armor Class: +3 to existing armor
Special Abilities: Bestows upon the wearer immunity to psychic and radiant damage; once per day, they can invoke the power of the stars to automatically succeed on any saving throw.]

Fiend's Embrace:[
Fashioned from the tanned hide of a legendary demon, this cloak pulsates with an intimidating aura of dread, granting the wearer dominance in the battlefield.
Armor Class: +3 to existing armor
Special Abilities: Enemies within sight must make a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed with fear, and the cloak can absorb the life force of fallen foes to heal the wearer.]

Primeval Sentinel:[
A treasure bestowed only upon those who prove themselves as true protectors of the natural world, this cloak is as ancient as it is powerful, shielding its bearer from the ravages of time and combat.
Armor Class: +4 to existing armor
Special Abilities: The wearer becomes resistant to all physical damage, can enter a stasis once per day to fully regenerate health, and is granted the wisdom of the ancients, providing advantage on all Intelligence and Wisdom checks.]

entries.content:
<loot>
When this event triggers, the player is rewarded with a common, non-magic item, completely random, at the discretion of the dungeon master.

Gold is also rewarded at the discretion of the dungeon master. Level 1 enemies will drop 3-15 gold each, and higher level enemies will drop proportionally more gold with each level.
</loot>

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Ouroboros Loop:[
Description: A ring of seamless gold that devours its own tail, pulsating with ancient magic and the cyclical force of creation and destruction.
Special Abilities: Grants the wearer the ability to resurrect once per week as the ring consumes itself, then reforms over seven days. It also offers a constant regeneration of health, slowly mending wounds during combat.]

Wildgrowth Pendant:[
Description: Bound with the essence of the first druidic agreement, this necklace is a living covenant between the ancient forces of nature and the soul that dares to harness them.
Special Abilities: The wearer can call upon the power of nature to heal their allies completely once per day, while also granting immunity to control and transformation spells. Additionally, it allows the druid to communicate and command wildlife with unparalleled authority.]

Chronoclast Amulet:[
Description: Encasing a fragment of a shattered hourglass, this amulet hums with the raw power of unraveled time, offering control over the most inexorable force known to any plane.
Special Abilities: Allows the wearer to slow down time for everyone but themselves once per day, granting them additional actions while their foes are caught in the temporal wake. It also provides resistance to age-altering magics and effects.]

Sovereign Wraith:[
Description: Forged from the spectral ore of haunted crypts, this silver ring is eternally cold to the touch and veiled in a ghostly mist.
Special Abilities: Wearer can phase through walls and solid objects twice per day. It also grants the wearer a chilling touch that can paralyze a foe once per long rest.]

Dragon's Heartbeat:[
Description: Containing a single crimson scale from an ancient wyrm, this necklace pulses with the might and fury of its former owner.
Special Abilities: Enhances the wearer’s constitution, grants them the fearsome presence of a dragon causing enemies to hesitate before attacking, and allows the invocation of a dragon's breath weapon once between long rests.]

Oracle's Signet:[
Description: Engraved with premonitory runes and holding a crystal clear as still water, this signet unveils the truth and lays bare the hidden threads of destiny.
Special Abilities: The wearer gains clairvoyance, able to scry on distant places or people. Additionally, once per day, they can foresee an opponent's move, granting them a preemptive action in combat.]

Soulshard Band:[
Description: An obsidian ring, seamlessly forged, with a core that glows a pulsating crimson. It sings with the captured essence of lost souls.
Special Abilities: Increases the wearer's spell power (+6 base damage), particularly for necrotic spells (+12 base damage), and once per day allows the absorption of a soul to rejuvenate the wearer’s health fully.]

Lifebinder's Chain:[
Description: A necklace with interlocking links of mithril, each link engraved with ancient healing runes. It shimmers with an inner light that reflects the pulse of life.
Special Abilities: Significantly boosts the potency of healing spells by 50% and grants the ability to resurrect the recently deceased once per month.]

Aegis Amulet:[
Description: This amulet features a diamond at its heart, surrounded by protective sigils that resonate with an air of impenetrability.
Special Abilities: Confers upon the wearer a protective shield that regenerates at dawn each day, capable of absorbing damage that would otherwise prove lethal.]

entries.content:
[System Command: From the list below, award an item that is usable by the player.]

Shield of the Behemoth:[
Forged from the essence of a creature that's lived and died by the sword, this shield is the stuff of campfire tales and blood-spattered legends.
Armor Class Modifier: +4
Special Ability: Wearer gains advantage on all Strength checks and can, once per day, unleash a ground-shattering slam that knocks enemies prone within a 15-foot radius.]

Gorgon's Glare:[
This piece isn't just for blocking blows; it's a testament to turning the tide of battle with a gaze that could petrify a mountain.
Armor Class Modifier: +3
Special Ability: Once per encounter, the wearer can turn an attack back upon its sender with a reflective snarl, and petrify an attacker with a failed saving throw.]

Last Stand:[
Crafted for those who will defend until their dying breath, this shield doesn’t just protect; it defines the line between life and death.
Armor Class Modifier: +2
Special Ability: As the wearer's health wanes, the shield's power surges, granting increased AC and damage reduction as their hit points decrease.]

Guardian's Grace:[
This shield is more than a piece of armor; it's a divine instrument, consecrated by the highest clerics to turn the tide of battle with the light of the heavens.
Armor Class Modifier: +2
Special Ability: The bearer can channel divine energy to cast 'beacon of hope' once per day, bolstering the spirits and healing capabilities of their allies, while radiating a holy light that damages undead enemies within its glow.]

Purifier's Bulwark:[
Hewn from sacred oak and silver, this shield carries the weight of countless exorcisms and rites, its surface etched with sigils that repel evil.
Armor Class Modifier: +3
Special Ability: It emits a purifying aura, cleansing allies of curses and poisons while bolstering defenses against demonic and undead adversaries. With a prayer, the wielder can invoke a wave of cleansing light once per long rest.]

Reverence Aegis:[
Forged from celestial bronze and bathed in the waters of a blessed spring, this Aegis embodies the unassailable might of the divine protectors.
Armor Class Modifier: +3
Special Ability: Any healing spell cast by the wielder is amplified, restoring additional hit points. On command, the shield can erect a barrier of divine energy, granting immunity to all damage for a single turn to the wielder or an ally.]
